Reviews.Content: I decided to buy this tablet for a Christmas gift to my best friend's child. The listing on Amazon stated that the product was new.Parcel arrived at my friend's address, and when she removed it from the courier packaging she noticed damage to the product packaging, and no taper seal from Samsung.Upon closer inspection we found that the tablet was refurbished, and not in my opinion in a state for resale.The accessories were scratched and chipped rather badly.The seller was called and spoken to within 10 minutes of the courier parcel arriving, the representative offered a refund and sent details for returning the tablet.Advertising a product as new, and sending a poorly refurbished product is just bad business.

Reviews.Title: Never again
Reviews.Author: DK
Reviews.Content: I've cheated on the iPad/iPhone numerous times with epic failure.  Never again...  Thanks for trying Samsung, but you fail.  This product has one thing going for it and that's the front mounted speakers.  This thing was lagging just 36 hours after playing with it.  Bought the Retina Display 4th gen iPad at the same time to compare and the screen on the iPad blows the Samsung away.  The speeds were vary similar between the two tablets.  Just can't get over a product lagging right out of the gate.  Not smooth at all!!  Randomly reboot twice when I was surfing the web. Had the same issue with the Galaxy SIII.  It would be jumpy and laggy.  Shame...

Reviews.Title: samsung software is buggy
Reviews.Author: NigelTuffkin
Reviews.Content: The featured  software that comes with it is buggy.  Media hub and music hub hangs a lot.  THey would hang on first use.  Peel, the software that's supposed to let you add  tv's, blue ray players, stereo  to control via the tablet doesn't work.  I setup rooms fine but the next time you try to use  the app, nothing responds (won't  load program listing and won't operate any device).I'm in the process of loading apps  and will have to update this review to see if  those apps perform with  any consistency.

Reviews.Title: Universal Remote? Fo Real?
Reviews.Author: Mr.Batman
Reviews.Content: Everything about the Samsung Galaxy Tab was as expected EXCEPT the universal remote feature.  The software which comes with the remote was more than disappointing.  The app does not work properly with many products via IR and has been difficult and cumbersome to set up.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Tami Boreman
Reviews.Content: The tablet is really nice but having issues with process com.Google.process.gapps has stopped working everything just freezes up and can't figure out how to print to my hp wireless printer

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: John "Y"
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my wife at the costco. The costco has instant rebate promotion now.From the day one, my two daughters are constantly using it for various purposes.Great screenFast responses32gb external memoryIt is a great tablet for the price!

Reviews.Title: A few drawbacks...
Reviews.Author: Justin S. Budrow
Reviews.Content: The Samsung galaxy tab 2 10.1 is a very great Android tablet, but there are some things you may want to be aware of- performance wise, you are getting a somewhat slower tablet experience, with lag just on the home screen- the tablet backing is made of plastic (I personally don't mind this, but I just want to include)- the cameras are horrible. It is good for taking simple snapshots with the front-facing camera, but the rear camera without flash is not good-could be cheaperOther than those 5, this is a very great tablet. I am a student and I frequently use this tablet for studying and reading. This tablet is even good at controlling my Smart TV (with IR Blaster). If you do think that the 5 points are drawbacks, I consider looking at various 7 inch tablets like the Nexus 7 or Fire HD, or even the ASUS Transformer Pad TF300, which is the same MSRP as this tablet, except it has better cameras, and faster processor.***********UPDATE************This tablet and other Samsung Galaxy Tabs have recently been updated to Android 4.1 Jelly Bean. Although it is not the latest version of Android, it still brings great features such as Google Now and a slightly faster UI.For those wanting to know other Samsung tabs, the Galaxy Tab 3.0 lineup is scheduled to be released this year.

Reviews.Title: My experience
Reviews.Author: blueocean
Reviews.Content: I bought my first Galaxy Tab II early this month.  By the way, this is my first purchase of any tablet.I got it early June, and I was playing around with it, right top side of the screen popped out.I could see what is inside of the device... Other than this, everything worked okay.  But it really bothered me and decided to return it for new one.I got my second one, however, this time the connection to the PC stopped working.  I have to hold on to the plug really hard with one hand in order to stay connected with PC. This is so frustrating.  How can they make the usb plug so sensitive. I just used for a week!!!!  At this point, I don't know what to do; to get a refund or exchange for third Galaxy.

Reviews.Title: Battery charging is atrocious
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I have only been using this tablet for 6 months. It will now take over 3 days to recharge after it dies. Absolutely the worst piece of junk I have ever spent my money on. I just turned it on after three days charging out of my wall outlet. It is at 15% battery. BUYER BEWARE

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Laura Wilson
Reviews.Content: Disappointed.  I bought this for my daughter and gave my original Galaxy to my son.1. no stylus - really?2. Different size, even though they both are 10.1 this one is smaller which meant I had to buy a new cover3. Figured out why no stylus - tried to use one I bought for my tablet and it does not work.  Really, how crappy.So disappointed in this version.  Wish I would have saved some money and bought the old version for my daughter.  I love my tab 3 but the 2 is very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: First one
Reviews.Author: Rocky V. Scott
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet i have ever bought and though it's slow going using my limited knowledge of tablets but am well pleased with everything i have done so far.

Reviews.Title: Charging cable is too flimsy (poor quality).
Reviews.Author: Gavin Munday
Reviews.Content: Bought two Galaxy Tab 2 (10.1 inch, Wi-Fi).  The charging cable is too flimsy and prone to internal wire breakage.  I have had to buy replacement cables three times over a few years.  It is aggravating that Samsung only sells a replacement cable together with the charging plug.  Samsung needs to re-engineer the charging cable.  Also the placement of the charging port at the bottom tends to stress the cable when using the tablet in a reclining position.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2
Reviews.Author: Raymond S. Iorio
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, works well and while it takes a little getting used to becomes easier to use as time passes.

Reviews.Title: It's okay.
Reviews.Author: yohana patricia
Reviews.Content: I think the device is fine. But the annoying thing with android is, when I installed a lot of applications, it started slowing down. Initially I bought the device to be used as an ebook reader and replacement of laptop(for writing papers), and other things(a lot of things you can do with android apps). But anyway,I think this thing is too heavy for me to carry around, not that heavy tho, but I just think maybe a 7 in tablet or a 5 in phone would be more comfortable for me. Anyway, performance is fine, it's doing what we expected it to do, it's not that spectacular. I don't give 5 stars because I don't exactly love it, and I don't give 4 stars because I don't exactly like it, I give 3 stars because I think it's okay. Performance wise for you who likes this tablet may be 5 stars, because of my personal preference I give 3 stars. I still think the tablet is SLOW.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy 10.1
Reviews.Author: SteveFl
Reviews.Content: I like this thing.  The first one I got was DOA, but after an instantaneous and painless replacement from Amazon, the second one has been flawless.  There is so much you can do with these -- surfing, Skype'ing, music, movies, maps, books, etc.  Bluetooth, WIFI, and all the Android apps.  I'm a bigtime gadget guy and this is my go-to device for any time that I leave the house.  Roadtrips, airplanes, the grocery store or the doctors office, this tablet performs very very well.  With a set of Bluetooth headphones you can listen to music (or Pods or whatever) and tune the world out.When I'm not traveling, the Galaxy lives in my living-room where it has become the 'pick it up and find out about that' thingie.  Recipes, weather, who was in that movie, and all that.  There are Droid apps for controlling your TV (and your air conditioning for that matter).  The price/performance ratio for this tablet is outstanding.  It gets constant use in our house and I'm glad we got it.  If there is something that some other device does that this one does not, I am not aware of it.  And, yes, some of my friends are Apple-people.  You don't need that.  This is good enough.  Better than good enough!

Reviews.Title: read in  one of t review a customer had t same problem maybe i should have listen did not put it bad or nothing
Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: everything works well but cant understand why just like that my tab just wont charge thats my problem my tab is new i should not be investing in a new charger just yet

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Diana Medellin
Reviews.Content: Excellent product  already using it  and its a great place to by an electronic  item it was in an wxcellent conditions

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Bargainfairy
Reviews.Content: I looked and researched for a long time before deciding on the Tab 2.  For my purposes...email, searching the Internet, Facebook and the occasional photo, this suits me just fine.  I also purchased a "for dummies" book to help me learn the finer points.  I'm still in the learning curve but I was able to operate the tablet immediately.  (And being 65, I don't have the skills of younger users) While I love the portability,this is a w i-fi only device!

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Tab 2 vs. iPad
Reviews.Author: Ernest B. Wagstaff "The Professor"
Reviews.Content: I have an iPad and wanted to replace it with the Galaxy 2. However, after receiving the Galaxy 2 I decided to keep the iPad. Both tablets are nice and the price for the Galaxy vs the iPad is why many people, including myself, select the Galaxy. However, after comparing the two for several months now, I have to admit if I had to choose between the two, I would select the iPad. The iPad battery life is far superior to the Galaxy. I would guess that I get 3X more battery life percharge from the iPad than the Gallery. Also, the Galary developed an inconvenient glitch. Whenever I power down the Galaxy it restarts instead. A second power down does the trick but why would I need to do that? I have decided to keep both. While one is charging the other is available. Maybe this is a case of "you get what you pay for."

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet good value
Reviews.Author: dawn
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet about 2 months ago on sale (since the newer model is out) and I have no regrets.  I had a 7 inch Samsung but I wanted a larger screen for reading purposes (middle aged vision LOL).  The only complaint I have is that the screen can lag when I touch it.  Other than that it has been awesome.  I use it almost more than my pc (thanks to splashtop).  The screen quality is great.  I can increase storage with an sd card.  The sound is fine.  I don't game, but I pintrest, surf the web, emails and keep score at ballgames.  The battery lasts all day.Overall, it was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: An Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: MrsLow
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1 is great for all ages. It's extremely easy to use and very efficient. It uses the Google Play Store. The camera is reversible and takes clear pictures. But, it doesn't have a lot of ways to edit pictures, other than the basics and filters. The software is Android 4.2, it's the "Jellybean." The display is amazing! It comes with a USB cord, too. It also comes with Bluetooth that's already installed. A feature I really enjoy is adding G.B. All you do is buy a new SD card , put it in, and you have more G.B. instantly. It also has great resolution: 1,280 x 800 pixels. The size is great. It's nice and thin, but not so thin that it'll fall out of your hands. It's simple to transport, too. The sound is crisp, clean, and not fuzzy. You can do downloads very easily. Downloads include fun things, such as, movies, music, videos, games, and much more! The Play Store doesn't supply you with every app that Apple has, but it has most of them. I would recommend this product to someone who needs a computer that isn't very big. Another nice feature is, if it's loading slowly, you can stop running other apps by going to "Settings." The battery, time, date, notifications, settings, and more can be accessed by tapping the bottom right corner. I highly recommend getting this product, it's very useful. It's super easy to use, fun, and worth your money. It's very efficient and a great product.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Kami (JA)
Reviews.Content: Met my expectations. My 2 year old took it over completely. Light and easy to handle even for a child. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy tablet 2
Reviews.Author: TCG
Reviews.Content: Great!  Fantastic! Hardly use my laptop anymore. My 11yo niece reccommend it and ofcourse she uses it better than me.

Reviews.Title: EZ To Use
Reviews.Author: Prof. Docwell "Docwell"
Reviews.Content: I am a senior citizen and have used computers since the days of the Commodore 64. I found this unit really easy to use for even a novice. The color is great, picture very clear and bright, sound excellent. I use it to do online shopping, playing Angry Birds and other games and web searches. Great for doing research about the actors of a movie I may be watching. Get the stand-up pad with it for use in bed.One problem, my 13 yo grandson glammed onto it and I haven't been able to get it back as he is a real gamer and won't relinquish control!!! Now I have to order another one!

Reviews.Title: Meets my expectation and then some!
Reviews.Author: Steven P Jewett
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love the mobility and portability of the unit.  The picture is sharp for the movies I download and the dropbox app lets me use this for work docs too.  I needed something that would allow me to edit word docs and it can.  I find the keyboard easy to use too.  I'm glad I bought this.

Reviews.Title: bought refurbished
Reviews.Author: julie
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure if I want to buy a used or refurbished tablet period, but I'm so glad I did. First off I loved this tablet from playing around with it in a few store and I feel it's equal to if not better than any iPad or kindle. They Tab is perfect for my mom and she can barely use a computer. She surface the web, watches movies, and listens to her favorites songs. Her keyboard and screen are very responsive and a good size. This was a really great buy and I have no regrets.

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Cindy Leger
Reviews.Content: This tablet works very well and its very easy to carry around especially when using it for college.  Very easy to connect to the internet and download apps.  So far I have no complains!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Alex Guevara Jr
Reviews.Content: Better than I expected.  Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a tablet.  Definitely worth the price I paid.  Totally satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Jayne2014 "Lady Jayne "I love a page turn...
Reviews.Content: I have had my Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 for a few weeks now and I have to say that I absolutely love this device.  It is a great pair for my phone as well.  The speed and access is amazing.  I have access to my schools dashboard so I can travel and never miss class assignments as I can do them on the tablet and turn in. There are so many apps from Google Play Store and Samsung to be downloaded.  I have also extended my memeory so that I use less internal memory and to transfer files directly from one device to another.  O-M-Gosh the best device purchase I made since my Samsung Galaxy S-III phone.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Bella
Reviews.Content: Exceeded expecations, bought this as a present for my husband, he loves it I dont think that he has put it down since he got it. its very fast easy to use and a great step up from the old galaxy tab 2 thumbs up

Reviews.Title: More Than I bargained for
Reviews.Author: Christon Mayers
Reviews.Content: This piece of gadget is like a mini computer in your hand fell in love with it from the first day no problems what so ever its like everyday I learn sumn new about it... highly recommended

Reviews.Title: Better than an Ipad
Reviews.Author: encino78
Reviews.Content: First off let me say that this is by far the best tablet I have ever owned. I've gone through ipads and kindles, but this is the cherry on top.Pro: Everything: The sound is incredible, the screen is great, the battery is amazing. I give this product a 5/5 hands down the best money can buy. Samasung really delivered a great product.Cons: I'm not sure why, but samsung decided that non of us like to play with our tablets while charging. So they made the charger extremely short. That is literally my only complaint.I would recommend this product to anyone. Solid, Reliable and Fun!

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Laura Lentz
Reviews.Content: I have a Galaxy SIII phone & this tablet just feels like a bigger version of it. Very easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2
Reviews.Author: :Leona J. Spann
Reviews.Content: I love it, because It is so easy to use and it does everything my computer does.  Everyday I discover something new.  I had tablets before and they seem to be complicated but this one has even helped me with my IPhone which I have had since 2008.  Now I have a REAL tablet.  The others was toys compared to this one.

Reviews.Title: My Experience...
Reviews.Author: Shane Metz
Reviews.Content: Love it!Pros: Audio, Video and Graphics, Ability to use ReadyShare by Netgear, Ability to Play MKV files, Complete Desktop Style Internet, Keyboard, Access to Google Play Store App Catalog, Access to Amazon App Catalog, Access to Samsung App Catalog, Ability to open PDF and Microsoft Office files.Cons: Charging Port Placement, wish it was on the side; Some apps are portrait and not landscape with no option to change; Camera not the greatest.Overall, I love this tablet. Even with it's cons, I would purchased it again and again.

Reviews.Title: Nice!!
Reviews.Author: christopher charles
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet I just got it and I already fell in love with this..lol but if u like big get this

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: Bought the tab for school and studying.... works great for that!!!!! I am able to do projects on the tab and see all my teachers power point soooo no more printing thank God for that now I just take my tab to class to view the power points and to take notes

Reviews.Title: This is a good unit
Reviews.Author: good
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and it is very good. I don't understand why anyone would not like this tablet. It performs well and the battery seems to last all day.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: KEUlb
Reviews.Content: The tablet works great and fits my business applications very well. I chose this tablet over the iPad because of a combination of price and features, such as the ability to easily utilize different files via the mico USB port.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Tammy Siragusano
Reviews.Content: Great for computer virgins, even my husband who has never touched one before now.  He's picking this up pretty quick

Reviews.Title: sam g t 2 10.1
Reviews.Author: KINGKODA
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy the samsung galaxy tab 2 10.1, nice clarity screen and battery last long time. But you have to download flash player your self, you tube will show you how if you have any problems.

Reviews.Title: perfecto
Reviews.Author: julio
Reviews.Content: buenos dias todo llego en excelente estado un producto de buena calidad fue entregado a tiempo con las caracteristicas solicitadas

Reviews.Title: Cant ask for more.
Reviews.Author: Darnell Holmes
Reviews.Content: I'm using this tablet for just about everything. Studying, Reading, music, gaming, you name it. notice short battery life but i'm not over using it. Not going to take any stars since i knew about the short battery life before i got it but I am getting what I asked for from this tablet. I honestly say 4.75 stars/5 if I could.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Dom
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet when my computer was broken and had to use this and I am impressed with how responsive and great this tablet is. It is good for entertainment and work.

Reviews.Title: Love my new tablet
Reviews.Author: Gretch
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet & after reading all the reviews, I got one & I'm very happy w/ how it works considering the price. The only down side is that even if the screen is on auto brightness, under daylight, it does not get any brighter. I'm no tech savvy person but now I can go around w/o carrying a laptop-very lightweight too w/c I love.  I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Happy, Happy, Happy
Reviews.Author: Jared Springer
Reviews.Content: I am super happy with this Tablet.  I don't know what else to say.  I love Samsung phones so this was just another reason to keep using the products.

Reviews.Title: Lanatat
Reviews.Author: L. Eastwood
Reviews.Content: I was leary about buying a refurbished tablet but I couldn't be happier! Works and looks perfect. I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: SUPER TABLET!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a great unit.  I keep discovering more and more features.  My only reservation is that the touch screen is not always immediately responsive.  (Since writing this I have discovered that the "secret" to touch screen responsiveness is using a very light touch.) I bought it to read newspapers while I'm on a cross trainer machine at the gym and it's great for that.  It's also better than my Kindle for reading books.  It came in handy when I found I could take a picture with it and attach it to an email.  The size is very convenient.

Reviews.Title: Much bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: the buggser
Reviews.Content: My first tablet purchased and I went with a refurbished model.First observation - a very good tablet - does most things a tablet is supposed to do and does them well.Seems to be well made, a nice size and rather attractive.I've had the tablet for about 6 weeks now, have tried most if not all of its features and all work well.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: jacks
Reviews.Content: I have to have my laptop because of embroidery designing, but I love being able to setback and surf. I am learning a whole new way of surfing, at my age I been on home computers since early 80's so I love changes it is good.

Reviews.Title: a real delight! Glad I bought it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I 'm very glad I bought this Samsung tab 2 10.1 (wi-fi only version).It's like having a mini computer to connect to the cyber world when my computer is inaccessible.My Samsung Galaxy 2 works Great as a hotspot! (Wi-fi use is included in my t-Mobile 5g cellphone data package)I don't need to go out to look for a hotspot, because it's always available. I can even connect to the internet when my phone is at the other end of the house.A case for my tablet with a removable bluetooth keyboard is on the way becausetyping on the screen is a little too slow and awkward (for me).

Reviews.Title: My Wife Loves this!
Reviews.Author: Mark R. Hinrichsen
Reviews.Content: My wife is not really "tech friendly" but she wanted something to watch Netflix or get on the Internet to watch instructional videos for her quilting.  She really didn't want an iPad (which I also have).  This was a snap to setup and get the apps she wanted installed.  I also like it that you can add a micro SD card to increase memory.  She uses this every day now and is becoming more "tech friendly".  Yea.. it's a process...

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS TABLET!
Reviews.Author: Joshua Bernstein
Reviews.Content: I have always known Samsung to be a great brand,  in knowing this i find myself 'testing' other brands' products instead of buying samsung. Being that this tablet was so cheap i expected a little less quality and power, until i tried it. For the price this tablet is AWESOME and makes me wonder why i waste my time with other brands... And if this iz considered a "basic" or "low powered" option,  then wow!  You will not be let down with the Samsung galaxy tab 2, it has a beautiful display, AWESOME sound (the best I've seen on a tablet so far & the front facing speakers are where it's at!), i have put this tablet through the performance wringer with gaming, books &  comics, movies picture editing and the awesome overlapping widgets (which i think really? Why doesn't every tablet have this??) and i have only noticed slight hiccups (i think it was only when i tethered it to my mobile phone but my Motorola razr sucks! ) but no force closes, freezing or hiccups on wifi. Also i am always worried about the strength of a product because i am a big guy and don't go easy on my stuff and this has been great in size, build and strength.. Its been dropped multiple times from over 3 feet and came out with tiny scratches... I am extremely impressed way to go samsung! (i haven't even touched on some of the user interface features that make this tablet blissful, but i will leave that to you... Because you need to buy it! :D

Reviews.Title: Froze
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought it in December as a gift.  Just returned it for repair in March.  It froze and wouldn't turn back on.  Sent for repairs and only remarks were software problem.  Didn't say what they did to fix it.  Almost makes it sound like they did nothing.  Will see how long it stays working this time around.

Reviews.Title: What I always look for in a tablet ....
Reviews.Author: Melvin Cruz
Reviews.Content: A wonderful tablet, super simple and easy to use. Ideal for office work and not have to charge the laptop. Good resolution and excellent battery performance.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying!!
Reviews.Author: beth jones
Reviews.Content: The picture is wonderful....it is very easy to navigate. Enjoying setting it up and exploring the different apps. Its was a very good buy. Definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: ohh my God do I love this product... The simplest answer I can come up with is yes, a very outstanding yes
Reviews.Author: Chris Benning
Reviews.Content: oh my I thought I was going to be an apple person forever. That was untell I met this product,I immediately fell in love and that was well before I even received this product today.I love how this is so user friendly but yet advanced enough for me to keep me on my toes. I am just awestruck by the overall performance of this is very beautiful machine. so I give this product5 stars and 2 thumbs up

Reviews.Title: just as good as ipad
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant about getting it at first but am glad I did.It dose way more then the ipad.I have the ipad in my opinion I like the samsung tablet alot more,and use it way more. Definitely would recommend over anyother tablet and even the way over priced ipad.After learning how to use its simply the the best..........

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous & Fun (like all girls should be, lol)
Reviews.Author: Matt "Stormchaser"
Reviews.Content: Hmmm. What to say about the Galaxy Tab II that hasn't already been said a hundred times? That's tough. Oh well, here goes, lol. This thing is sick! Sweet on the eyes...good on the budget for the quality of the device you're receiving....a very solid build. Gorgeous HD screen, really bright, nice sound. Just install an .apk and "allow other software" under the settings to enable Flash capability, because now this ships with 4.1.1 Jelly Bean Android OS, not ICS 4.0, so learn how to download an .apk file and install Flash & no whining allowed, lol. I have had this tablet for a month now, and I'm still just scratching the surface on customizing it; recently been having fun with live wallpapers, gaming, etc. Just completely functional fun, and works very well pairing with a Microsoft Bluetooth mouse 5000 and Logitech/Zagg Bluetooth keyboard case (the aluminum one from Amazon). I'd suggest getting a 2 port USB wall charger, because if you're like me, this will be sitting next to your bedside on a table alongside your Android smartphone, and you'll be able to charge them both on that one adapter overnight to 100%. Gonna go eat now and play some Mahjongg Towers on my Galaxy Tab, haha.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: jay osborn
Reviews.Content: I bought my wife and myself each one of these tablets and so far they are amazing. She is abld to watch Netflix while getting ready for work instead of lugging around the 17in laptop. I am able to use it for school and takes up a lot less space. Over all I think this tablet is way suprior then the ipad and until three weeks ago I was an exclusive apple fan.

Reviews.Title: Why would you buy an iPad?
Reviews.Author: Ignacio Ottati "Sparty"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is way better than the iPad 2, better RAM, better screen, better software and most importanly better price! just compare them and you'll see what I'm talking about. I'm an android guy so I like this one better.

Reviews.Title: must buy!
Reviews.Author: greg in cleve
Reviews.Content: I was debating between this and an ipad.  After much research,  I purchased the Samsung tab 10.1.  I LOVE IT!It does everything I need and more. The big bonus is the extra 32 to 64 gb that can be easily added in memory card

Reviews.Title: Better than MAC
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: I love my tablet. I have books, documents, movies, music, games, etc on mine. It is fast, easy, and user-friendly. Android is always preferable to MAC~~~ Give it a try!! You won't regret the buy! But get a protective folder and plastic screen for it. It's less than $30 for both and WELL worth the investment!

Reviews.Title: A perfect 10.1
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: This tablet does everything and then some! My housemate has an Ipad and he always wants to use my 10.1! All my devices are Samsung and I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: happy partner
Reviews.Author: J. Craig Jr.
Reviews.Content: excellent tablet, wife is extremly satisfied with samsung galaxy tablet 2.uses it on a daily basis talking to son and grandsons.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Papa Wags
Reviews.Content: So quick and instant.  I leave my laptop closed a lot now.  I didn't realize how much I used multimedia

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: WAY BETTER THAN THE IPAD AND SO RELIABLE AND IT HAS A GREAT BATTERY LIFE AND THE APPS ARE THE BEST I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS OVER THE IPAD ANYDAY

Reviews.Title: Great Alternative to an iPad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I decided I wanted to buy a tablet to take with me when I travel for work, but I wasn't interested in the iPad for cost reasons, but I wanted a tablet more versatile than the Kindle Fire HD.  I thought this hit a sweet spot for me.  As a 10" tablet, it has the good screen size to watch movies or TV or just to surf the internet on.  The speed of the tablet will depend on how many widgets you have running at a given time.  Widgets can be very appealing since they can display information you want to see regularly right in the main desktop window.  They can be visually appealing since they help breakup the look of a page from just being a list of icons.  The downside is they can use up a lot of memory, just remove a couple widgets you won't normally use, and the tablet performs just fine.  For better or worse (and arguments can be made on both sides), you can only use Widgets on Android and not on iOS.Watching videos is a very good experience.  While you don't have the access to iTunes videos or Amazon Instant, you do have access to Google Play for movies and TV and can download apps for Hulu Plus, Netflix, Vudu and Flixster (Ultraviolet).  I used Flixster to download and watch some of the movies I have Ultraviolet copies of thanks to the BluRay, and it works great.  The movies load fast and look really good.  It is great to have access to my movies while on the go.  Each movie can be streamed over Wi-Fi or downloaded at 800 MB to 1.2 GB of size each.  As with all Tablets, wach your space as videos can eat it up quickly.Speaking of storage space, the tablet comes with 16GB of memory installed, and this is a pretty good size and can last you bit.  However, unlike the iPad the Galaxy Tab 2 has a slot to insert a micro SD card.  I happen to have an extra 16GB from an old android phone and now have a full 32 GB available.  That expand-ability is a nice feature.  Overall construction is good, it feels more solid than the Galaxy S phone, has a good weight and seems pretty durable so far.You give up the iTunes App store, but gain Google Play.  Review what is available in each and make your own decision, but I did not find anything that would be a dealbreaker.  All in all, my wife has the iPad 2, and now I have the Galaxy Tab 2 and for my purposes, I think the Galaxy is a great alternative and better suits my personal needs for a tablet.EDIT: I forgot to mention that I purchased a Refurbished product.  I have been using it a lot for the past 2-3 weeks and it is holding up fantastic so far.

Reviews.Title: Handy!
Reviews.Author: David Horsley "ironhorse2004"
Reviews.Content: Very nice if you are surfing the web or playing games.  Alot lighter than a laptop and the touch screen is great

Reviews.Title: I love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: Svetlana Lazarenko
Reviews.Content: good quality, screen and picture is great! I got refurbished product but I love it! Simple and elegant tablet! Recommended!

Reviews.Title: Cant put it down!
Reviews.Author: Colette D. Spurgeon "liquidnitro430"
Reviews.Content: Great price, great resolution, very fast. Synced with my phone immediately. I can even control my tv with it!! Perfect.

Reviews.Title: Replaced my laptop and won't buy another windows product
Reviews.Author: A. Riel
Reviews.Content: My old laptop died before it's 3rd birthday. It was an HP and the motherboard replacement was going to almost cost what I paid for it in the beginning. I am really happy with this tablet. I will never buy another windows product after using this. I have listened all day to slacker radio online while running off of battery. It only used 30% of the battery in a 10 hour day. It's lightening fast and will spoil you. After long use, you might have trouble running a regular computer and wonder why you didn't switch sooner. It's light, portable and nice to take your music on the road to play through the headphone jack. Buy a bigger memory card to store your files. I've yet to run out of memory on the tablet but need a bigger memory card. I used my friend's Ipad and I can't see paying a higher price and have limited options with apps compared to the Android setup. I thought not having a cd drive might be an issue but it's a rarity to need it as most everything is easy to download online now. You won't be disappointed with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Wendy M
Reviews.Content: I had originally purchased the first generation Kindle Fire and had been very happy with it. After Amazon came out with the updated HD versions I wanted to try something different instead that would have a bit more functionality. I am however one of those people who refuse to fall into the iPad, iPhone hole. I refuse to spend that kind of money on a product that will just be replaced in 6-9 months with a "new and improved" version that adds another $100 onto the purchase price. I do not want to spend over $450 on a tablet.  I still have a great desktop PC so I am not looking to replace that with a tablet necessarily. I am very glad I went with this one. I had originally considered going with the 7" model, but I do tend to watch movies on my tablets so the larger version seemed optimal for that reason alone. The screen quality seems great and I have no issues there. It does take some getting used to and I wish it came with more detailed instructions instead of just a quick start guide. But overall I think it is a great product and I am very glad I went with the Galaxy Tab vs the Kindle Fire HD. I was afraid I would regret the purchase at first, but I think I made the right choice.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: journeyman65
Reviews.Content: Fantastic, friend of mine paid 900 for an Ipad and they are always wanting to use mine. I never get time with it anymore !!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10 -inch
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am just getting  accustomed to my  new and latest tech product, an dis not an expert on tech products,  but in comparison to my laptop which was overheating and  the other tech probs with Windows Os. I would say the Android  is a great innovation in speed and the number of Apps one is able to use with  Android. I currently have the Android Galaxy 2  i1900  so  I can tell the difference. Battery life lasts for hours with moderate use;  have never really checked how much, but I do not have to charge every day as was the case with my laptop Windows Os. It's compact, not bulky  and  easily carried, with minimal space. It is so convenient one hardly notices  unlike having to tote with a laptop bag when traveling. I take it everywhere. Getting to know the features and  its functionality is an adventure and  I love it. Like the idea of downloading Apps basically hassle free. I am a senior  in my 60s and therefore I feel good to have such an improvement from my cumbersome laptop,

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: David B. Sherland Jr.
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my mom to do the basic computer functions through out the house and to act as an e-reader. Short and sweet review, it was packaged nicely and arrived around 60% charged as a lithium battery should be. The screen is very nice, the touch controls work well and so far the battery has lasted several days at a time with moderate usage. It is fast and responsive. If you are coming from an Android phone there is a small learning curve with the drop down menu being on the bottom right (doesn't drop down anymore I guess) and some other UI tweaks neccesary for the larger screen.

Reviews.Title: My husband is having a blast....
Reviews.Author: MamaD
Reviews.Content: One of the best xmas gifts ever bought for my hubby....Samsung never disappoints us, we have galaxy phones, a 51 inch tv  and a blue ray disc player...u might say we are a samsung family....

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Ruth Rice
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your time and energy researching other tablets.  This is the only personal tablet you will ever need and is quick and very efficient!R. Rice

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: The Galaxy tablet is awesome. It's just the right size. Easy to grab and go from room to room or on the road.  It's  great for reading from the kindle app, listening to music ( speakers sound great!!) or searching the web. I'm not a tech savvy person. I know enough to navigate through  the basics. The Galaxy is very user friendly. I''ve looked into getting other tablets for about a year. Checked them out in stores so I could get an up close look at them as well as reading comments from customers online. Think I made the right choice with the Galaxy tablet 2 (10.1")

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: barneywilma
Reviews.Content: an excellent buy. I definitly would recommend it. I love the fact that you can change the language on the key board so readily.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful pricing deal with great product
Reviews.Author: Denny
Reviews.Content: This is third time I purchase this product. First one was for my mother in law, second one for my son, and third one for my nephew. First time I am neutral for this product but I was falling love with this. I bought a 32 gb micro SD card and I can enjoy my fun movies and music anytime on this product. The battery life is good and the screen has very good brightness and quality. The speakers were great to hear music. My only concern is the resolution of this product, but it will drain more battery power if you have a higher resoultion. The performance of this tablet is great because the battery power and performance are very balanced. All apps were working smooth and fast. I do not have any complain for this tablet.One of geatest reason to buy this tablet is the price. $300 price deall for a Samsung large and well balanced table should be amazing deal.

Reviews.Title: Its worth to buy
Reviews.Author: Sudhendu Dwivedi
Reviews.Content: its wonderful product, I got this product in $299 and found much much better than apple's Ipad. This product fulfill your requiements with ease.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2
Reviews.Author: George R.
Reviews.Content: A bit heavier and slower than I expected. Can't seem to be able to download and run Flash player (yet) and therefore have not been able to watch/download movies from my favorite sites.  I have had it for 3 weeks and maybe there is something for me to change in the setting???  I have read that this device may not be compatible with Flash player but I advise you to double check first.  Great screen resolution and long battery life

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Catherine Tufano
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my husband as a gift, I have a Galaxy tab1 and I love it.  He uses it to watch tutorials on You Tube and he absolutely enjoys using this product so much.

Reviews.Title: Cool product
Reviews.Author: Cecilio
Reviews.Content: This was a pretty cool product, anyone with out a computer who wants to use this as a replacement it is great. Does almost everything a regular computer can do. With out the bulkiness

Reviews.Title: Worth the investment!
Reviews.Author: David T. Pickering
Reviews.Content: The Galaxy is very nice and is easy to get around in.  It is a great substitute for the iPad at a reduced price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy is a Winner!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I replaced my first tablet with this Samsung and find this tablet much easier to use.  I use it every night to play games both online and offline.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: diana tovar
Reviews.Content: Excellent product! It arrives on time and it was exactly what it was expected from the beginning. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love my tab
Reviews.Author: lia
Reviews.Content: Love love this tab! I have ipad and this one was gift for my mom. She love this toy, it has many good functions and apps. Thank you

Reviews.Title: I love this thing!
Reviews.Author: Joni M. Shahin "Habibti812"
Reviews.Content: So much more bang for your buck than getting an ipad! After researching we went with this tablet and let me tell you I have not been let down! I am a big fan of android products so I like the OS and all the great free apps in the app store! All four of my kids love it too! It's highly customizable and so convenient! My husband even got me the logitech bluetooth keyboard to go with it and it's awesome! I hardly go on my PC anymore!

Reviews.Title: First Tablet and very pleased
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "The Wanderer"
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love it!  The screen is very clear, the weight just right.  I love the many apps that are available to me, and went wild downloading stuff.  The fact that it has MS Office apps is also a wonderful bonus.  The photos are pretty good quality too.  It's easy to get around because he buttons are clear and you can figure your way around easily.  Only thing I miss is the USB port.  Otherwise, a great buy at a great price!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for news reading
Reviews.Author: Fernando Alemany MD
Reviews.Content: My wife has an I-pad. I'm not an Apple fan so I anted some thing different. After looking and reading about different tablets I settled on this one. After having it for about 2 months I'm very happy with it. The battery last almost twice as long as my wife's Apple I-pad (Ha!). It responds to our Wi-Fi faster than the I-pad (Another Ha!). My only concern is that in order to download other web browsers (like Firefox), you have to open an account with Google. Saving web sites takes some getting used to and seeing some site like AOL come through in a bare bone form. I prefer  AOL full featured.  Will this replace m laptop? NO. But it will be taken out on short trips where waiting may be involved ( Haircut, when shopping with my wife, etc.).

Reviews.Title: Headphone Jack Trouble
Reviews.Author: BeachSand "Beachsand"
Reviews.Content: I have had this Tablet for about 4 months and the headphone jack has never worked well at all.  I had blamed myself for something that I was doing or not doing.  After months of struggling with different ear buds I called Samsung.  They sent me a UPS label to send it back to them.  I just got a message that they will be sending it back and repaired it at no cost.  They had to replace the headphone jack on it.  I hope I get it back when they said.  I really like everything about this tablet, however I have not heard of anyone having this problem.  If it had not been for this problem I would have given it 5 stars.My question is, has anyone else had this problem?  I hope it doesn't happen again after the warranty has expired.

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: BB
Reviews.Content: I have been doing a lot of research on tablets and finally made the decision to go with the Galaxy Tab. The screen on this thing is amazing! The battery life has really exceeded my expectations as well. The only thing I am a little upset about is the fact that you can't upgrade to Flash player 11. Now, I am not sure if this is specific to this device or if it has something to do with not being compatible with Android OS. All in all I am very pleased with the purchase and would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mr. K. S. Skaggs "happily retired"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is beautiful and works beautifully.  Does everything I was looking for.  The screen is very clear and bright.  Like to auto-dimming and the fact that I can override it and set the brightness to what I like.  Like others have mentioned, this unit is a little heavy and battery life is a little short.

Reviews.Title: Where's the Flash?
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is actually a very nice tablet, however, the Samsung Web site for the Galaxy Tab 2 says "With Adobe Flash player you have access to more videos, websites and games. Instantly enjoy the latest movies or TV shows." Unfortunately, it appears that Flash is not supported on this device. That was a major disappointment. I had hoped to play Flash-based games on Facebook.

Reviews.Title: Great Tab for average user
Reviews.Author: Erwin Knohr Mendoza
Reviews.Content: This Tab is amazing, I bought this to change my old netbook, it has everything I need and I wantedLatest android Os ICS, the UI is nice, easy to use.Web browser with Flash support.Office application for Word, Excel and PresentationsVery light and portable with nice screen sizePowerful device, great for gaming (Mario N64) and multitasking (at lease using web, word, and music)

Reviews.Title: Love the tablet
Reviews.Author: Sushi
Reviews.Content: I love the Samsung tablet, I had gift cards from doing surveys online and got almost $150. off, what a bargain, it pays to do surveys.  I bought decorator skins for the tablet and it looks so nice, fun too.  I'll be the talk of the town....

Reviews.Title: Gr8 Device
Reviews.Author: cedric fraser
Reviews.Content: I had a Samsung Galaxy1 10.1, wanted an upgrade so i decided to go for its successor over the ASUS Transformer. The price was very attractive and well within my budget.PROs1. Memory Card Slot. I purchased the same on amazon to complement my device.2. Touch Capability. Enhanced, works like a charm3. Ice-cream sandwich. No complaintsCon1. Sound/Speakers. The built in speakers could have been better. Its almost the same, if not a little worse than the predecessor.Overall, a great device.

Reviews.Title: wont turn on after 4 month
Reviews.Author: rdiana38
Reviews.Content: after 4 month of use my tablet is now dead, wont turn on, and it seems to be a common thing since when i google the troubleshotting alot of people complain of the same thing

Reviews.Title: Sweet perfection!
Reviews.Author: T. Weaver
Reviews.Content: So glad my laptop died, gave me an excuse to buy this tablet primarily to be used as a music player for teaching line dancing.  Wakes up right away when you turn it on.  Easy to navigate.  Stores all my music on micro SD card.  Easy to download songs from PC via supplied USB cord, instead of complicated shared folders in Windows.  Found an app that allows slowing down a song without changing the pitch.  Plus I can browse emails or websites.  Read the news.  There's even an app to send/receive text messages, using WiFi, with easy to see 10" screen.  It even changes the channels on my cable box right from the TV listings screen.

Reviews.Title: Had for about a month
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey P. Schiffman "jschmorris"
Reviews.Content: My wife had an Ipad and I have an Iphone but wanted to experience Android.  Couldn't argue with the price...about $125 lower than Ipad.  I like the screen resolution and once I got accustomed the how it operates had no problems.  I've watched tons of video...including a couple of streamed movies.  Found that when watching video had to jump up the brightness.I've also started to use as my Kindle Reader.  I have one of the original Kindles and still use it but I also enjoy reading on the tablet.Lots of Apps available but some of my magazine subs--including SI--are only available for Ipad.  Hope that gets changed.Overall a 2 thumbs up...especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: So worth it...
Reviews.Author: Holly Hamilton
Reviews.Content: I have been going back and for between getting the Ipad or the Galaxy Tab 2 for months.  After reading hundreds of reviews and comparison reports, I decided on the Galaxy Tab 2.  I love my iphone and thought I'd stick with apple products, but my wallet got the better of me and I got the Tab 2.  NO REGRETS!!!  Everything I need is available for the Tab 2 and I love using it.  And I love the fact that I'm not a slave to any particular vendor...yes there are choices out there!!!

Reviews.Title: Happy, but......
Reviews.Author: S. Meyer
Reviews.Content: Love the Tab 2 and my other Samsung products.  The only problem I am having is that the USB sync cable only works about 30% of the time I plug it into my desktop computer running Windows 7.  When I plug it into my laptop running Window XP Pro, it works every time.  I have literally spent probably over 3 -4 hours on the phone with level two tech support at Samsung - and level two support is hard to get in touch with!  No solutions.  They even linked up with my desktop with no success.  They said it must by a defective USB cable!!!!  They finally sent me a replacement, but that was not the problem.  Now they say send the Tab in for service.  But that will not help as it works fine with my laptop running XP Pro.  Very frustrating!

Reviews.Title: A great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Rick "Azul"
Reviews.Content: Been using this for a week and it is just great. Fast, Bright screen, lots of apps, Easy to use and set up. Nice size screen. It is intuitive to use if you have an Android phone, Just the same in looks and function. Some of my apps transferred over when I logged into Google account. Nice. All my pics from phone transferred over too.If you are looking to get into a tablet this is a good choice, especially for the money.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Tab 2 is an outstanding tablet, don't waste your money on an iPad.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 is one of the best tablets on the market. The price of 299.00 plus the 10.1 screen and smooth operations makes it a no brainier for anyone looking to step into the tablet world or advance users. I am so pleased with the product until I have reduced the usage of my iPad 2 tremendously. Oh yeah, I upgraded it with a 64gb micro card that has increased my memory to 80 Gb total for a small purchase of 32.99 from amazon. For my Apple lovers, show me an new iPad 1, 2, or 3 with 80 Gb for 332.99 out the door. Don't worry or bother looking because it doesn't exist. LOL

Reviews.Title: My fun new toy
Reviews.Author: A Boy Named Sue
Reviews.Content: Prior to the Galaxy Tab 2, I have never owned a tablet. I've always wanted one, but I could never find a proper excuse to purchase one. However, my wife decided to get me one as a gift, and I LOVE IT! I just started playing with it, but so far, I love everything about the device. The display is beautiful, the battery life is great, the controls are easy to learn and are very intuitive, and it has so many cool extra features that I enjoy using (like the screenshot ap). I'd like to add more to this review once I've used it over a few more weeks, but so far, it has my seal of approval. I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet and works very well. Excellent battery life
Reviews.Author: The Goat
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for her birthday and she normally is not onto the techno-gadgets as much as I am, but since then her laptop has pretty much been holding down her night stand since she got it. Between the great size, speed at which it connects and wakes up, to the overall ease of use--- she admitted that she really likes it. For me since I use an Android powered phone, it was refreshing to have something that felt native and easy to integrate with all of our gear. The other good part is that when we travel or go anywhere, I hotspot my phone and she has 4G or 4G LTE speed internet. For that alone, she likes it as I can drive and she can surf--- and if she finds someplace we want to go and needs directions--- key up Google maps and navigation and you're good to go.Battery life has exceeded my expectations by far. I know that there may be better displays out there, but for the features and price this is a very solid tablet. I also like the fact that it is light and most websites display as they would on a PC. To date no drawbacks and if it weren't for a handful of programs that I run... I'd get one for work. We have put off on getting one for a while and compared to others that I have seen (mainly  the iPad) it definitely above it in terms of quality and functionality. There will always be an i-anything group of followers and I am definitely not one of them. I was going to go for a Lenovo tablet, but I couldn't resist the price and with Samsung seeming to do us well as far as phones, TV's, and even appliances... it was only natural.Although I did not purchase it through Amazon, I still wanted to leave a review. Their price is fine and honestly I would have, but I walked into our local Costco and as an impulse of sorts to do it right then and there--- I bought it. When it was all said and done with tax--- the price was exactly the same.

Reviews.Title: Generally Pleased, But
Reviews.Author: jdt
Reviews.Content: This is my first adventure into the Android arena.  The Galaxy Tab2 10.1 seems to be a really good tablet, but there is one short coming I want to report.  Beware that the specs identify support for 802.11n, but that is misleading.  It does not support the 5 GHz band, but only the 2.4 GHz band.  I wasted considerable time trying to connect to my Netgear WNHDE111 Access Point with its 5 GHz only band.  My Galaxy S3 connected immediately without a problem.  Samsung customer support apologized for the issue and confirmed my finding.  I don't blame Samsung as much for the hardware deletion as I do for not be forthcoming in the specification and wasting my time.  I have subsequently upgraded to a new Netgear R6300 which supports both bands.

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: Alaska Girl
Reviews.Content: I agonized over this purchase.  I wasn't certain I would use any of the small tablets.  I already had a Kindle and totally loved it, but wanted more from a device than is offered with the Kindle Fire.  So I finally decided on the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1" WiFi only.  It turned out to be a great choice!  I totally love it.  This tablet will do everything I need it to do while traveling without the weight of a laptop.

Reviews.Title: So far so good.
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Pros: Good all around tablet with great battery life.  Removable sd card is nice also.Cons: Can be a little slow opening apps/pages.  Maybe a quad core instead of a dual core would solve this? Another small thing is that the camera doesn't have a flash.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Tab 2 10.1
Reviews.Author: J. Hanks
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet, and it is awesome! Going on youtube, the internet, and the app stores is really fast. I have downloaded some games like angry birds, doodle jump, and temple run. They all run without lag and are better on this than the iPod Touch. The video editor is very cool (reminds me of windows movie maker, but without as many options). If you use live wallpaper it is a bit laggy swiping through menues, but isn't to much of a problem. For my first tablet, I really enjoy the Galaxy Tab 2 10.1. I definetely recommend this to anyone who likes cool gadgets.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Student
Reviews.Author: Robyn
Reviews.Content: I just got my Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1 today and I have to say that I am loving it. My school uses Google Apps so it works great as I am a college student.The main features I plan on using are....GMAIL, S Agenda (or calendar), internet, polaris office or Drive (google docs) for taking notes in class, and netflix.I am using a tablet for school because I commute from home each day and my back hurts from carrying around my 6 pound laptop and my textbooks. I am going to buy as many eBooks as possible and bring my tablet to school to alleviate stress so I won't even need a backpack at all, just a small purse or bag.For ease of taking notes, I also bought a wireless logitech keyboard!

Reviews.Title: Almost There (Read This Review!!! )
Reviews.Author: ss "ss"
Reviews.Content: Back Story to make this review objective.Last year I bought the original samsung 10.1 tab and quickly returned it for the ipad 2, because honestly the first generation samsung tab was horrible. I loved the Ipad 2. Very refined and stable. Now, I'm a big android fan and decided to get a tablet for work since android / samsung has improved greatly on their phones (I own a Samsung Epic 4G touch which is near perfect and blows apple iphone away).This new samsung tablet is almost there. It has everything you would want. Applications don't crash, very customizable. Good enough camera. But here is the thing. The graphics processor hesitates and stalls. The apps don't crash, the transitions hesitate and stall. The only browser that is good for watching integrated video is the chrome browser, and even that has issues (can't even compare with the ipad 2 when it comes to watching integrated video. ). The browsers (no matter which one you use) still lag and freeze with almost every website.If the tab didn't have the hesitation, the choppy transitions between apps /screens, and the browser lag, the tab would be perfect. Almost there! I may return it and wait for the quad core samsung to come out. we'll see. Also, avoid the Asus TF300. It lags, freezes, crashes, and is NOT touch responsive. It was a horrible tablet.Almost samsung, keep going, let's see what you come out with next.

Reviews.Title: Was Good But No Longer/ Lousy Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I loved my tab for the first several months until a recent update.  They changed or removed several features making it far less convenient.  Among other things, they moved the notification bar to the top so that I can no longer see it when using many apps, which means I must leave an app now to check email and Facebook notifications verifications.  I also can no longer see the clock, battery usage, etc. when using many apps.  The worst thing though is that my Tablet will no longer shut down.  It just restarts when I attempt to shut it down.  This means that I will no longer be able to take it with me on airlines that require a complete shutdown of electronic devices.  Being that I use it for everything when I travel, I may get stuck having to buy some other tablet for travel purposes.  Finally, when I attempted to contact customer service to see if there was a way to shut it down, I kept being told by each department that they couldn't help me and then directed to another department where I got the same message. Reviews.Title: Jack of All Trades
Reviews.Author: Derek
Reviews.Content: I am submitting a review on this tablet after shopping for Tab 2 accessories and becoming at what other owners have written about it. I noticed many prior reviewers comparing the Tab 2 to the iPad, and many others hadn't owned their Tabs as long as I've owned mine. I will start by saying that I am a bit of a techie and love cutting edge technology. I hate Apple, not because they aren't the best at what they do, but because I cannot afford them. When my birthday approached this past August I asked my girlfriend for an iPad, but due to the price I was told to make another choice ;) which is when I decided on the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2.Be aware that Apple is the holy grail of tablets, bar none! They created the market and redefine it every year. When Samsung, Asus & et.al, make a new tablet they compare it to Apple's current generation iPad. When Apple releases a new generation iPad, they have to compare it to their current generation iPad. Both Apple and its competitors realize the standard is set by Apple; everyone else is vying for second place. Having established the Tab 2 will never be a serious competitor to any generation iPad, consider why it was created. Samsung created this item while being sued by Apple for design infringement. This tablet was created to avoid direct comparisons with the iPad. It was engineered to be adequate in all areas, so that could provide an affordable alternative to more high end tablets on the market, and it succeeds very well in that purpose.I have owned my tablet for a bit over 4 months now and it is truly a jack of all trades although, master of none. If you want to perform mobile gaming (distinct from social gaming due to a loss of flash support) this is a good option. Less hardware intensive games like Angry Birds play well on it, but I have purchased and played a few hardcore shooters on this Tablet and it handles games that are optimized for the Tegra 3 chipset even though this tablet does not have that technology within its build.As for media playback, this is a solid performer. It handles HD video, streaming video from Hulu +, Netflix and Vudu through an app call Flixster with ease. Songs (even those streamed through Google Music or Tunein Radio) and video sound great through the side offset speakers while the front and rear cameras do a respectable job at taking photos and engaging in face chat based applications such as Skype. There are even apps built into the device that allow sharing of media to Smart TVs as well as an IR blaster that allows you to control TVs, cable boxes and even a specific one for DirecTV.For productivity, there is a native Office-like App (Polaris) an email client that will sync with your work email and compatibility with Evernote, Dropbox and Google Drive. The plastic build of the Tab ensures a solid and stable connection to wifi, (even with weaker signals) built in expandable memory for presentations and a split keyboard option for extended typing sessions. There's even a security feature that allows you to track a lost/stolen tab through samsungdive.com.Overall this is a niche tablet that is designed for cost conscious customers who want a robust mobile experience whether it be for business or pleasure. It excels at being a mid-level entry. It is NOT a high end tablet. Apple creates products that have best in class screen resolution (except the Nexus 10) fastest processors and most durable products on the market. The big difference between the Apple and the Samsung is Apple gives most consumers more tech than they'll ever need, where Samsung allows consumers to decide how much to pay for their tech based on usage needs.

Reviews.Title: Alright, could be great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is a tablet that could have been great. Unfortunately, Samsung just had to leave their mark on it. The from factor is nice. It's super light, and Ice Cream Sandwich looks good... almost.Android 4.0 and above is a very solid good looking operating system, so it baffles me why Samsung feels the need to dump their crummy "enhancements" all over it. Let's go over them-The settings screen is customized in a way that is inconsistent with google's own UI guidelines for android-The bottom bar has an added "screenshot" button. I might be unique, but I don't really need a screenshot button that can be pressed at a moment's notice. How about a settings button instead?-There is a lame OS X style app drawer that pops up at the bottom of the screen. I can't customize it, and it doesn't seem to do anything useful.-Samsung breaks the simple colors of the holo theme by adding random colored icons into the notification and battery area. Android looked fine without them.-Samsung's UI adds bugs into android. I write android apps for a living, and we have to test specifically on samsung devices because their customizations break our apps in strange ways.The long story short is this tablet would have been great if it ran stock android. Samsung made it substantially worse by putting their mark on it. If you want a solid android tablet, get a Nexus 7 instead.  If you want a solid 10 inch tablet, get an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Should Have Waited
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I bought this pad because I was super anxious to get one and it seemed to be the best one out there at the time. I was torn between this and an Ipad  and obviously opted for the Android platform for a multitude of reasons.  I should have waited...It's not that I hate this pad, but knowing what is soon to be released is why I should have waited. Again, I don't hate it overall but I do hate certain aspects of it.  I'm going to go a little backwards here and list the cons since they are the reason for this review.The keyboard: I can't tell you how frustrating the auto correct is. It makes even entering passwords a chore. Typing on this thing is like hearing fingernails across a blackboard. Turn off the auto correct you say? Well, it's actually more of a headache than having it on.Samsung Apps: I have to mention the music player. I cannot believe the developers even use this app.  It's horrible. Try to shuffle songs from a certain artist.  It usually took me three minutes to get it going, no exaggeration. Also, it grouped my Google voiemails in with my music when on shuffle play. So, I'd get to randomly listen to my voiemails in between songs. Annoying!Performance: this thing really lags. Scrolling is really choppy and the touchscreen doesn't respend often.Ok, now for some nice things about it:Screen: great brightness when needed. I like the auto brightness setting a lot. Not a retina display, but nice.Design:  sharp looking, feels good in hands.Ok, I need to wrap this up. Again, I don't hate this pad but it is frustrating to operate. Really, I think most of the .problems with it are poor user interface on many of the Samsung Apps. I know I can load a new music player but I'm rating this thing as is. I tried loading a new keyboard and I have to select it every time I want to use it. Frustrating.Wait for the Google Nexus or Asus Infinity.
