Reviews.Content: I am no geek, nor am I even a "techie."  However, I do enjoy my computers and gadgets for work and entertainment.  After considerable research, reviewing, and use, I chose this Galaxy 10.1 Tablet2 and have never looked back.  Sure, there were a couple advantages with other competitive products like Apple's IPad, but I took great satisfaction knowing I'm enjoying all the benefits at half-the-price.  I use it for work and for play.  I take it everywhere for checking email, writing, surfing, research, online shopping, watching movies and TV, playing video games, utilizing huge array of aps, and on-and-on.  Droid OS is fantastic, and I virtually do everything I want or need with it... with one exception:  It does not make coffee!  (But I use it to purchase and have coffee shipped to my doorstep! )

Reviews.Title: The Galaxy Tab runs circles around the rest
Reviews.Author: Raymond W. Gellatly
Reviews.Content: This Tab is perfect for my mobile needs. Plenty of memory and room for adding more. I cant even think of any other feature you would need to add for my purposes. The battery life is incredible as is the screen resolution.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Easy to navigate and offers more ability than the iPad.  Great to watch movie and read books using the kindle app.

Reviews.Title: Six months later
Reviews.Author: Brian Staudt
Reviews.Content: This tablet works just fine. its running 4.1.2 I believe, which makes it slightly laggy, not always the fastest swipe through screens, but works like a champ. Things I would change are making it automatic sleeping, so after a certain amount of use it turns off or prompts you for wifi and bluetooth use, although you can just download tasker and use it that way. I wish it had NFC, but having this and my Galaxy S3 send its info back and forth is perfectly fine. Using wifi direct is pretty great since the info your sending is only restricted to the maximum speed of the slower wifi module. I can share a video on my phone to my wife using this and she's able to yell at me from another room! But its also good for viewing and editing pictures, video and sound, good for reading and watching videos. If your thinking of buying one and already know you like the Samsung touchwiz then you'll like this too.

Reviews.Title: This is great!
Reviews.Author: Lynne "just me"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my parents (who are in their late 70s).  My dad had a stroke in Nov 2011.  He used to be on the computer playing games and forwarding millions of emails every day.  Now it is difficult to get his wheelchair in the computer room, and using a mouse is hit or miss - literally.  It took a lot of time and patience to show them how to use the tablet, but it was a successful endeavor.  They are able to do basic things on it, like games and email...and check the weather.  It was a good purchase!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet out there...
Reviews.Author: Dr. Bill B. "(Term 75)"
Reviews.Content: OK, that is just my opinion, but I certainly feel that way.  This is one powerful tablet that was my actual computer when my desktop went down.  I did email and internet surfing.  Supports the latest WiFi bands and is lightweight and stylish.  I love it.  I would highly recommend it to anyone considering a 10" tablet under the Android OS.

Reviews.Title: quality
Reviews.Author: Batabling - DBA Batabiz "bata-bling"
Reviews.Content: read the other reviews by Arthur K. Yellin, Z. Falborn, and Daisy S. they helped me decide. awesome tablet. plenty room and a micro sd card port. bought some acc. to adapt a flash drive. only gripe is the non - standard charger. Samsung tab 3 has a standard charger.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: DONNA HASENPLUG
Reviews.Content: Even though this was 'refurbished', it looks and operates like a brand new item....except I didn't pay the 'brand new' price.  I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Quite good
Reviews.Author: S
Reviews.Content: It was a good buy. Sorry I didn't know that the Tab3 was coming out so soon. The item went on sale again a week after it was bought though. Make sure that you pay less than $300.00 for it now.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy tab 2
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this tablet I use the internet, play games, read books, skype and it keeps up! I really enjoy it and given the chance I would recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: This thing rocks!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Cowan "math lover"
Reviews.Content: When I first purchased this, I was just comparing the iPad with the Samsung tablet.  I felt a bit guilty at spending the money, but it is now something I use every day.  I never understood why people would want to read using a Kindle, iPad, Nook, etc.  Now, I get it.  It is super lightweight, easy to adjust the text, and almost hands free.  It is super easy to download Apps, and I've even used the navigation.  The best way to describe it, is it's like a Smart Phone on steroids.This is my first tablet, so I'm probably just blown away by new technology.  I love this thing. It is super fast, and I can check my email, read, surf the net, etc.  I love how lightweight it is, and how long the charge lasts.  It also synced automatically with my calendar in my Samsung Smart Phone.  Wicked cool!

Reviews.Title: Love my Galaxy Tab 10.1 !!
Reviews.Author: Logan Rivers "Kathy"
Reviews.Content: I have had this for only 4 weeks and I love it.  It's fast, and what I love most is all the features/apps you can run on it.  Makes me question why I still have my laptop; but I actually bought this tablet as a substitute for it because of it's small size and weight.  Screen color is awesome and I just bought an adapter to transfer files back and forth to my laptop.  Another add-on is the keyboard.  While I have found the installed one is fine, it does take some time to adjust your fingers to where the buttons are and not to press down.  To make typing easier, that's where the keyboard comes in handy but for trips, I can leave it at home and be just fine !Only Con- as usual for all electronic products, no manual.  But I did find one through Google, downloaded it, and now I have found even more functions available.Do yourself a favor and downsize; am not an Apple user, don't have an Iphone but with this tablet, you don't need it !

Reviews.Title: Called  customer and was told they would have to get in to my account.
Reviews.Author: joycelcarr
Reviews.Content: I like the tab but have had trouble finding a manuel for it.  I called the number that is on the internet for customer service and ask him if he could tell me how to get rid of the tabs on the top of the picture and he wanted to get on my computer and charge me.  I had been doing it right but I just had so many on there that it was telling me it was full.  My son helped me and it is okay but I was surprised that there would be a charge for the manuel and for information on how to run it.

Reviews.Title: i like this tablet
Reviews.Author: ammar
Reviews.Content: i was wondering which to buy iPad 2 or Samsung galaxy tab 2, i bought this because i like android it is easy to use and have many apps for free

Reviews.Title: Awesome toy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Tablet Girl"
Reviews.Content: Why does anyone feel the need to write a two page review,  when it can be summed up in  just one word? Well, maybe three~ awesome, awesome,  awesome! !  I had a Coby Kyros two years, and decided to upgrade.  The technology has been so perfected, there is no comparison.  I asked the question on this site about Flash, because I really wanted that, and was told by everyone that Android tablets DON'T have flash.  I found out you CAN  get a really nice app now called ~ Photon Flash & Browser for Android ~ but only on Google Store.  Amazon apps doesn't carry it yet.  I have been using it all day, and it seems to be working great.  I like some things better on the browser too.  So go out and get it, or better yet, order it from Amazon,  ~ super fast, great  price, free shipping, no tax,  what more can I say?  The price @ $299 is the best you can get.  The new Tab 3 has all the same bells  and whistles but costs lots more.  I always check on "Amazon reviews" , and your reviews  helped me decide to purchase this tablet.  So  I  want to help others to enjoy this great Sammy.

Reviews.Title: Love my Galaxy
Reviews.Author: Slopok
Reviews.Content: I bought my galaxy after a friend told me the androids were passing the I pads in many different ways . I did a lot research online and found it was a better deal. When I got it and took it out of the box it was very easy to set up and to get started. Of course the instruction manual had to be downloaded. I bought one from Amazon. I would advise to get one up front. It is a lot better to have it in front of you.It is fast. Does a great job. My wife has an I pad. I like the Galaxy much better. It is also more inexpensive.

Reviews.Title: A good choice at a fair price
Reviews.Author: Pamela Fisher
Reviews.Content: Cons: Only prints to Samsung printers. Does not allow use of Adobe Flash Player. I have tried downloading the latest archived flash player from Adobe but cannot make it work properly on the Galaxy Tab 2.Other than that I am happy with it and am pleased with the purchase. This is my first tablet and for me there is a big learning curve as using it is quite different to operating my Lenovo laptop and HP desktop.All in all I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!
Reviews.Author: AGCB
Reviews.Content: Ive had my Samsung for about 24 hours now, and I'm totally loving it! I originally bought a kindle fire hd, but quickly found out that was worthless for anything other than an e-reader.  So the next day I went back to Best Buy and exchanged it for this Samsung and boy am I glad I did! It does everything I need and more- I may never use my desktop again. I love the personalization options and the Google Play Store rocks! Samsung has one verrrry satisfied customer over here!

Reviews.Title: Juat what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Jack H. Meili
Reviews.Content: It is fun and easy to use and performs all functions I have need for. Would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Grate resolution
Reviews.Author: Vic "vitin6039"
Reviews.Content: I was reluctant before I decided to get the Tab 2 but no regrets, very slick and powerful, don't see a reason why to spend hundreds more for other brands.

Reviews.Title: good product good price
Reviews.Author: ex-Canadian doc
Reviews.Content: Bright screen with excellent colors in same league as IPAD too many preloaded aps clutter up opening screen takes a while to learn how to use it no documentation comes with device

Reviews.Title: Better than I thought it would be
Reviews.Author: P. Susi
Reviews.Content: Before I bought the Tab2, I had to check out tablets in general at a local electronics store to see what the keyboards were like. A few minutes with the Tab2 10.1" convinced me that I would have no problem typing on it. It has met all my expectations. Clear image, easy to use, lots of apps (like I need them all) and long battery life. The downside is that you need an adapter for a USB device. Not a big deal, but why not have this built in? But, overall, so far so good.

Reviews.Title: New Tablet
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Brandon "Stephanie Brandon"
Reviews.Content: I love the tablet,  great shipping,  however, this tablet wasn't new! My tab came in "demo mode"! Had to get support to do a factory reset, which of course wiped out all my app's that I had setup already.  Other than that, I love it!

Reviews.Title: LOVE, LOVE,LOVE
Reviews.Author: cakebaker4hire "Rachel Daniel-Scott"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Samsung Galaxy Tab 2. It was love at first open!!!! Its sleek,and light, and the screen is so crystal clear. I am still learning my way around it,but so far I love everything about it. And my favorite feature so far is the one touch "screen shot" . This is my first tablet and I have a Samsung galaxy S3 phone and they sync together. My calendar and contacts on my phone are available on my tablet... its awesome !!!

Reviews.Title: All I needed
Reviews.Author: Duk
Reviews.Content: Before the purchase, I've read all the reviews. Since I’ve had a good idea of what to expect and what I wanted, my decision was to buy it. Tab 2 P5113, excellent device, excellent Android version, excellent touch, Micro SD slot available, and so on. I have no complains. I'm fully satisfied with the device and all its features. Very good, I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Vivian
Reviews.Content: I have had this product for a few months and still use everyday. Its great for gaming, school work, research, watching movies, and almost anything a computer can do plus more. Worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 (10.1-Inch, Wi-Fi)
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Ellison Jr.
Reviews.Content: What else is there to say? It is exactly what I was looking for. It beats any of the I products that I have seen. Others here in the office that have the IPad are switching to this.Tom Ellison.

Reviews.Title: My 1st tablet
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: I consider myself computer savvy but have run into a few complications (some of which I have been able to get around).  For example, there is no way right now to merge calendars from other applications.  You are able (if the other applications allow) to save to a particular file format, download then upload the file into the tablets calendar but I don't consider this "user friendly".  I would like to see Samsung put out more software that will work with other applications.The only other thing that should have been available on this nice tablet is a FLASH so that you are able to take photos in doors.Other than that, I think the hardware is very nice, HD screen a big plus and sound is very nice!!

Reviews.Title: Looks & Feels Better Than iPad
Reviews.Author: Ramses
Reviews.Content: Nice tablet for the price... You won't be dissapointed.  Samsung Media Hub + Android + Google Play + App Store is an amazing combination!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Android!
Reviews.Author: BD
Reviews.Content: We got this android mainly to use with our ifit module on our exercise machines so we would have a street-view.it works great and I use it as a main computer most of the time.  I love it.  Charges quickly and easy to use and learn.Would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Out with the iPad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Decided to give my iPad to my son.  Switched to Samsung (including my cellular).  I love it!  Next...  my TV.

Reviews.Title: What I like most about Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 (10.1-Inch, Wi-Fi)
Reviews.Author: lovegreatdeals
Reviews.Content: It's easy to drop so get a case. I recommend Finecase Perfect Slim-fit Folio Leather Tablet Case Cover with Adjustable Stand for 10.1-inch Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 (Green). That case is light and sturdy. The Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 (10.1-Inch, Wi-Fi) has so many neat features. But by far the biggest selling point for me is the battery life. I recently took a 6 hour road trip. Let me tell you the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 kept my kids occupied for most of the trip. It was a lifesaver. They were having a ball playing games and watching movies. Plenty of juice left on the battery after 6 hours. I don't know about Apple iPad battery life but Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 performed quite well. I also love the built-in IR Blaster, you can watch and control your TV right from your tablet. So you get a smart remote that would cost a few hundred dollars alone.The only thing I didn't like was the fact that description stated it was compatible with Adobe flash sites. However, when I first tried to get on a site running flash I got a message saying this site doesn't support your device. I was able to find a plug in to run Adobe flash. I think it's called "Adobe flash 11.1 plugin". Once the flash issue got resolved everything was smooth sailing. So if you're looking for an alternative to Apple iPad you won't go wrong with Samsung Galaxy Tab 2.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Tab 10"
Reviews.Author: Andre Pau
Reviews.Content: Hi  bought this Tablet for my partner so she could keep up with modern trends and appswell pleased we do everything on it now including the monthly shop /top-up.Its such a handy device and has all the speed and portability of a laptop but a 1/4 of the weight.Touch screen takes some time to get used to but works well once you use it a bit more and become familiar.Ideal device and would recommend to all work or play  10" is much better than its smaller 7" and ideal for more mature users. Would rate a good 9 out of 10

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: richard weaver
Reviews.Content: All I expected and more .I also have a nexus 10 4 months old that cost over 100.00 more but does less. I'm very impressed

Reviews.Title: Percfect forr what I need
Reviews.Author: jgood
Reviews.Content: I would have given it a five but it does not use the adobe flash player. This means that some video and some apps will not work on this tablet. Otherwise it is prefect.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "iowagolflady"
Reviews.Content: I love my Samsung Galaxy tablet!  It is portable and stays charged for a long period of time.  It does everything I expected it too!  The clarity of the resolution is amazing!

Reviews.Title: My Samsung Galaxy Tab 2
Reviews.Author: B. Van Ness "Cloudwaltzer"
Reviews.Content: I am new to tablets and am still getting use to it.  It is a great alternative to my laptop and I like it very much.  I would recommend this product to everyone!

Reviews.Title: I really like the unit and performs very well.
Reviews.Author: Ryan Sheridan
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet.  It is the first tablet I have owned.  Easy to use and understand. Works at a quick speed and no issues with connecting with wi-fi hot spots. I highly recommend this product.  Just don't buy the the Wireless Keyboard case from Samsung cheaply built!!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: RecentBSEE
Reviews.Content: I use it more often than my laptop.I use for typical things like Skype, news & weather, youtube, games, and music.It has never crashed on me, but I don't keep apps running in background all the time.  The battery last long enough for me.I chose the Tab2 over the Note2 because it was cheaper.The only con I have is it is sometimes slow to bring up the keyboard for text input (i.e. searches).  My Galaxy SIII is the same way; it might be the software but I'm not sure.

Reviews.Title: Very nice tablet
Reviews.Author: crbco "crbco"
Reviews.Content: Tablet was very easy to setup and use, very clear video. Easy step by step instruction on tablet. Only problem with tablet was the downloading of a bank app. Does not support Bank of America app. Other than that it is a very good tablet.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with purchase
Reviews.Author: Hans D. Lenz
Reviews.Content: I compared this product with the iPad and decided on the galaxy because of price and features. The  product is the reliable and I met my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Work Like ipad
Reviews.Author: M. R. tenber "tiger"
Reviews.Content: Very good price if you compare with ipad 3/4, and it works not like ipad, but hard to say differenceit will do the job.. bit heavier then ipad 3/4this is the best TAB  for peoples with the low budget

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2(10.1-Inch, Wi-Fi)
Reviews.Author: NELLY HIDALGO
Reviews.Content: I love it, is very funtionality and and meet ar my expectations. I like it very munch, very funtionality and ideal!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas A. Forrester "lover of praise"
Reviews.Content: Samsung is truly the way to go! This tablet is almost flawless in its design and function. I could not be more delighted.

Reviews.Title: Great and flawless
Reviews.Author: madcow
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife to do just about whatever she needs.  At this point, it hasn't failed us at all.  It keeps connected to our wireless network at all times and has never crashed or frozen.  The battery also seems to be holding for a good amount of time.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just the feel of the tablet u can tell of the great workmanship it is not made cheap worth ever dollar still learning how touuse it but old dogs can learn new tricks i am never with out it love it more than my laptop

Reviews.Title: Nice budget 10-inch tablet
Reviews.Author: Refuge Denied
Reviews.Content: Other than a bunch of bloatware that Samsung included, this tablet is quite nice for the money.  This was a 'replacement gift' for my father.The first tablet I bought for him gave him (ie. us) a lot of problems.  That was really disappointing as it was a Windows 8 (Asus Vivotab Smart) tablet that we both really liked when I first gave it to him.  I returned that tablet after 2 weeks of problems and bought this for him.He's had it over a month, and so far there are no problems to report.  It's very responsive, he is able to check / send email (AquaMail), browse the web (FireFox Mobile), and sync his Thunderbird contacts and calendar (BirdieSync).  He does forget how to do things from time to time, but I suppose that comes with age (he's 77).  I'm just a quick phone call away to help out anyways.I haven't really seen a use for tablet for myself, but after playing with pop's Galaxy Tab 2 a bit, I am starting to think I might need one.  That new Note 8 looks promising ... too bad there's no data radio in the US version.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: M. Bell
Reviews.Content: I have a Kindle Fire and think this will totally replace it, plus.  I especially like the fact I can listen to my audio books, search the web and use it for my email.  It doesn't replace my laptop as it's keyboard is much more awkward, but I expected that.  I would totally recomment it to someone who just wants a good tablet without spending big dollars.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet.
Reviews.Author: Justin Wigren
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 as a birthday gift for my wife. She uses it a lot. She likes the widescreen. She has problems with her vision, and the widescreen helps her see better.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected!
Reviews.Author: Colin Hanephin
Reviews.Content: This tablet is the first one I have ever purchased, and I was expecting it to be alot more complicated to use than it is. The picture is great. I do not see any reason to spend $200 more on a newer version because so far it has done everything I expected it to do and more! It is a great product.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Cmoney
Reviews.Content: It's a good case I like it and great tablet u purchased I'd recommend to friends and family I enjoy my samsung galaxy 2 tablet

Reviews.Title: My First Table
Reviews.Author: Carlos Cuervo
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, has been my first tablet. And the choice of 10.1 is the perfect size for use. I was able to connect with my samsung LED smart TV UN40ES6500 and all excellent. The only bad thing is that the rear camera has no flash

Reviews.Title: Great service, great product
Reviews.Author: Marinewifemeg
Reviews.Content: I ordered a tablet for my husband's birthday and We are very pleased.  It's even got me thinking of selling my iPad and switching.  I love that you can purchase an SD card for additional memory.  I highly recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: gail
Reviews.Content: I am completely happy with my Samsung Galaxy T2.  A friend bought one; I fell in love with it, and worked out getting one myself.  I have become such a fan of this tablet that I have gotten 6 others to buy one too!  Even 2 strangers I met in a shop!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Albert Ploof
Reviews.Content: Best gift puchased for my wife - love the wi-fi feature - being wireless is great  - she can take it with her outside and lounge on the deck - the ease of use with the touch screen is great - will look at buying another one

Reviews.Title: absolutely love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Best purchase so far the speed, features,  style are great.  Should have purchased a while ago glad I made my decision to get it.

Reviews.Title: Nothing like it.
Reviews.Author: Jozzics
Reviews.Content: This is the last tablet you will ever need. I got the screen covers and the Samsung Book Stand on mine, and it works and looks beast.Five stars, should be more expensive.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: C. Bagley
Reviews.Content: I like the galaxy tab 2 very much.  nice size screen and light weight.  only con I can say is sometimes it can be difficult to copy and paste items.  other than that a must buy A+

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: siren
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this tablet! i have the bluetooth keyboard case and use it all the time. it's so easy to carry with me and fits in my bag, has gorgeous screen displays, is intuitive and easy to use, and has a great battery life. i originally had a Kindle Fire but replaced it with this, as i wanted the keyboard and a better battery performance. this was an excellent purchase and i would recommend it to anyone looking for a good tablet. i'm very impressed with everything about this tablet -- it's very customizable as far as options go.i enjoy the tablet so much, i'm considering switching to an Android phone instead of a new iPhone.

Reviews.Title: buen producto
Reviews.Author: edeciogr
Reviews.Content: El producto llego excelentes condiciones y se entrego en la fecha indicada estoy muy agradecido por la atencion; el producto funciona perfectamente

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Peter Cevallos
Reviews.Content: Very decent product. Still getting use to it (old laptop user), but it very easy to manuever. Apps are plentiful.  I would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Got this for my son.
Reviews.Author: BIG DOG "BIG DOG"
Reviews.Content: I thought that is a lot for a product, but my son wanted it he is 15. Keeps him busy and he uses it for school and just about everything else. It is easy to use and has great features.

Reviews.Title: I adore this product!!!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Dickison
Reviews.Content: I was a bit worried when I read the reviews, but at such a good price I couldn't resist. It's not super-powerful and it's Wi-Fi only, but it suits my needs. I prefer reading email on the tablet to my laptop. It is fast and has a nice clear picture. I believe it was a good value. For my purposes, it is excellent.

Reviews.Title: incredible!
Reviews.Author: Demian Martinez
Reviews.Content: I am actually enjoyning this product. I can see my favorites videos , and to readbooks, listening to the music, i am really exited with my samsung tablet.

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet
Reviews.Author: The Reconditioner
Reviews.Content: This is a slick, well-built tablet. The buttons are well-placed and well made. The screen is bright and user-friendly. There are plenty of apps aboard, and many more available. It is designed with the user in mind, and anyone coming from the Windows world should find Android comfortable.

Reviews.Title: Ipad got company !
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: This thing is awesome I love it now check it out I have a iPad gen 2 and got one of these everything you can do on a iPad and more I think but...now here it is the iPad is a little smoother no it doesn't affect movie or videos but the iPad is a little more gracefull but......simply not as fun as the Samsung more free better apps plus all the apps you can get on the iPad but not to be said as a broke mans iPad cause it's not it's as good as or if not better then the iPad at times !

Reviews.Title: Glad I choose this tablet . . . love it more every day
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: The Galaxy Tab2 10.1 exceeds all of my expectations.  I was shoping for tablet and considered the Kindle Fire 8.9 and iPad.  After reading all of the great reviews provided by fellow shoppers, I chose the Galaxy.  I am very pleased with my decision.  Thanks for all of the great reviews with tips and tricks that lead to my final decision.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Tab 2
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This tablet is everything we wanted and more!  Great for reading and games.  The whole family loves it!  easy access to wi-fi

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Kenya St Bernard
Reviews.Content: It's a great tab. I just can't stop using it.  The camera it's not the best but there are so many greats aplications that we can use that I really don't care about the camera.

Reviews.Title: even more than I expecterd
Reviews.Author: Maryna
Reviews.Content: Intuitive, simple to use, works more than 8 hours between charging. Many apps are free. It even supports Russian and Ukrainian languages which I needed.

Reviews.Title: yes
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: Iove the quality- so far its been great. Im still learning how to toggle around! I wish tbeir was a usb port

Reviews.Title: samsung fan!
Reviews.Author: Leo5
Reviews.Content: Very good tablet from Samsung, I've almost admired Samsung products and I own some of them. Highly trusted brand and this galaxy tab doesn't disappoint as well. Responsive touch screen and very vivid colors as well. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Betzamd
Reviews.Content: Todo muy bien, el producto, el servicio, mejor de lo que esperaba. Super satisfecha, sin ninguna queja . . .

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: CSC
Reviews.Content: I love it...I have nothing negative to say at all!! It is very user friendly and the stock apps are great too!!

Reviews.Title: Very nice!
Reviews.Author: Ana Cristina Orellana Chavez
Reviews.Content: So far it works perfectly. It is very helpful I carry it with me everywhere I go. I am very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it! Best money I could have ever spent! Couldn't Be happier! Works perfectly! I love the size, it fits in my purse and does everything i need it to!

Reviews.Title: excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Rene amaya
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this tablet, the quality is excellent not expect less from samsung, screen and excellent performance.definitely recommend them to my friends.

Reviews.Title: me encanta!

The boxes were very professional and purpose designed so they managed the trip to Australia with no problems.We are delighted with these units and they represent good value for money.  Highly recommended.Only one cautionary note to do with shipping. I used a third party shipper and got caught when they charged the shipping based on volume, as they are allowed to do, instead of weight. So the overall shipping cost doubled and almost wiped out the savings.  But as these units (wi fi only) are very scarce in Australia - like almost non-existent - then there was little choice but to buy from overseas.Would we do it again? - yes we would.  Would we use the same supplier? - yes we would.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: Thomas S.
Reviews.Content: Finally after owning this for 3 months i have decided to write a review.I have 100 percent no complaints with this tablet whatsoever.Web browsing: I use chrome and the web browsing is super fast. Pages with many ads load super fast and have no lag whatsoever. I don't like the layout of the stock internet app so that is why i use chrome instead.Movies: I use Netflix for most of the movies i watch and they look really nice on the screen. They stream really fast even if you don't have the best WiFi connection. YouTube movies also look very good. Load really fast and depending of the movie they look really good too. (if a video wasn't taken with a decent camera of course its not gonna look the best).Games: Some of the games i play include cut the rope, angry birds, drag racing, flow, and many many more. All the games load really quick and i notice no lag with any of them. When i first bought it i was worried that the games would lag a little bit but they don't at all.So many of you reading this will wonder how does this compare to an iPad. When Samsung first made this they didn't intend for it to be a comparable device to the iPad, the Samsung note is more of a comparison. But my dad did have an iPad 2 before and i used it before i got this tablet. And i believe that was about 500 (the iPad). I got my tablet new at best buy for 400. Even though it wasn't made to be compared to the iPad, the Samsung is far better than it. IOS (operating system of apple products)is horrible. They have had the same layout of the main pages for years and there is not customizing ability. You cant get widgets(best things ever) and it looks like something from many many years ago. Many of the apps crash for no reason on IOS too. My tablets home screen has a lot of things to customize. U can have apps and widgets. If u have a g mail account u can display your inbox on the home screen which is very nice. you can make a weather widget so you can see the weather 24/7.Productivity: I am a student so i got a keyboard that plugs into the bottom and basically turns the tablet into a notebook. The keyboard was 50 dollars and was for sure worth it. It works great and to type papers i use Polaris office. Its basically Microsoft word, power point, and excel for the tablet. And all of Microsoft documents are compatible with Polaris office so if i download a word doc. i can view and edit it in Polaris office. Also if i just make something like a book report i can save it as a word doc. so my teacher can view it on his/her computer.Actually one complaint but it isn't with the tablet its with Polaris office, it doesn't have spell check. Lol.Another cool thing that this device can do is control your TV. Trust me its awesome and it really impressed my parents. Also its funny to see their reaction when I change the channel and then dont realize that i can do it from my tablet and they think they just sat on the remote. The tablet comes with an app called peel. When u go into it asks you what brand of TV you are trying to control and if you have a cable box and stereo and that such. I can bring up the guide and see what is on and scroll through the channels. Also i can choose if i want the sound to come through the TV or i can have it come through the stereo and i can control that too. This took me about 5 minutes and i had no problems whatsoever with it.Overall: This is a wonderful tablet and even though 400 sounds like a lot, it is 100 percent worth it. Especially if u have a android phone, cause everything u do on your phone you can do on your tablet. It is really fast as long as u dont keep 900 apps running at the at the same time but if u keep 10 or less you will be fine. The battery lasted me about 10 hour and i was chenking my email playing games and using wifi so i guess maybe it could last a little longer. Its great for a student like me or anyone i guess. So i hope before buying an iPad you take a look at some things this tablet and any other android tablet has to offer.

Reviews.Title: So close, yet so far
Reviews.Author: J. B. Lesman "Distracted By Shiny Objects"
Reviews.Content: I wish this was everything I hoped for in a tablet, but it just wasn't. My husband had the smaller 7 inch version, and loves his. After lots of debate, reading reviews and finally 'pick a hand', I chose this model. When it first arrived, I was in love. It was fun having a larger touch screen than on my phone, and I could read everything so much more clearly. The sound is actually better than my laptop, and it's lightweight and turns on/boots up lightning fast. But then I noticed...After comparing with my husband's 7" model, I noticed that my pictures were not as clear as his. The smaller version had the better display.When surfing, I noticed that many things wouldn't load properly. Gmail opened at first, but then the screen would refresh by the millisecond as if it couldn't completely load. I couldn't see it at all in the standard Firefox browser, so I downloaded Dolphin. The Dolphin browser did allow me to read gmail, but that browser frequently just closes up for no reason.The battery cable attachment is inconveniently located at the base of the tablet. So it's hard to have it on my lap and plugged in at the same time, because I don't like to press up against the cable and bend it. However, the battery life is excellent, so it's not often that I'm faced with having to plug it in while I'm using it.EDITED to ADD: Most people won't have an issue with this. Thanks to a comment on the review, I realize that most people will just turn the tablet the other way. I've got mine in a very snug case that fits most comfortably one direction longways - and I'm a "widescreen person" which is why I bought the larger 10 inch screen.The screen response to my finger is not nearly as sensitive as on my phone. Sometimes I have to tap a field many times just to get the keyboard to pop up, and sometimes it still doesn't recognize my tapping, and I just give up and move on to something else.Overall I'd give it a Meh.

It works great and I can watch my shows at night in bed with out disturbing husband's sleep.

Reviews.Title: Good for day-to-day use
Reviews.Author: supernaut
Reviews.Content: Nice tab and I'm glad that I purchased it. it's sleek and very responsive. Movie quality when watching off SD card is good, it is not choppy at all.The screen is very responsive and overall the experience with this is greatedit 12/10/2012: For watching movies, download & install the "MX Player" app + codec from Google Play (2 installs). It is able to use h/w acceleration and makes a big difference.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Tablet
Reviews.Author: Neri
Reviews.Content: The expectation was high, Having a iPad and being able to use it on the road with 3G the Samsung had to be good. From the first time I turned it on it lived up to the expectation. Being wifi might have been a limitation but this proved to not be the case. It was easy to find a wifi hotspot when needed and as a bouns I also had a mifi mobile wifi device if needed. The Galaxy Tab is very easy to use and the android version 4 facilitated use on all websites I needed. I downloaded a few apps on the first day and have found everything needed in free apps so far. The downloaded maps made a good navigation device and having GPS built in without needing to use an internet connection was a bonus. Still finding new features so extremely happy.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Tricia
Reviews.Content: Love my tab, love the size screen, picture quality is great! I'm in love. Would recommend this tab to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've had this for two weeks now, and LOVE IT!  Fast, powerful, superb sound (with headphones,) excellent display, and great set of apps.  I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: C. Becket
Reviews.Content: I bought this thing to take on a long cross country motorcycle vacation.  It does everything I needed it to do and more,  Very happy with the unit.  It works flawlessly and the battery lasts forever!  The screen is large and most clear.  I can see why Apple was trying to get it off the market.  I'll stick with my Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Great Device, but...
Reviews.Author: M. E. Ferguson
Reviews.Content: I certainly can brag about how awesome this device is up to a point. I can read books, PDFs, see what time it is across the world, take pics, schedule the next 6-12 months of my life, add widgets, and review the weather. However, some of these along with other applications or more precisely, the tablet itself does not reach its full potential of usage without the help of an available WIFI network. I can effectively do more on my Blackberry with its 3G internet connection, but again who wants to watch video or read a book on a screen the combined size of 4 postage stamps -- eye strain!!!There is also incompatibility when trying to interface my tablet device to my Windows XP PC. Perhaps I will be able to remedy this in the near future.Would I recommend this device to a friend? Yes, but I would also warn them of the wifi/Internet dependency of the apps.As of 09/13/2012, I would also warn my friends that Adobe has ceased providing a Flash player plugin to watch embedded videos on certain websites like Comedy Central. Maybe it is not longer profitable to provide a free Flash player for Android beyond v4.0.x, I don't know. But if Android turns the tide of market share in their favor, then I think Adobe will step up to the plate. It also seems even the archive flash player I managed to install falls flat when it's called to perform.

Reviews.Title: Must Have
Reviews.Author: Ravi Gaikwad
Reviews.Content: Full marks to samsung for competing with Apple.... fully recommended if someone would like to buy cheaper versions.... This is very good if you compare with Apple ipad which is way to expensive....Only drawback is the charging cord which is very short in length.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic device
Reviews.Author: Yuriy
Reviews.Content: Fantastic device. I love it.Easy to configure, fast enough. Tablet feels comfortable in my hands. Bit heavier than Galaxy 1

Reviews.Title: Overrated
Reviews.Author: Vivia West-Price
Reviews.Content: I got this Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 for Christmas & just gave it back to my hubby. He & I are switching out with a regular Android that has all the features I need. What a waste of money. The darn thing doesn't have an HDMI slot to connect it to my TV so I can watch movies from Youtube. We tried the Chromecast which worked fine with the cheaper Android, but the Samsung couldn't pick up the signal. Then we tried another one & no success. I don't understand why such an expensive tablet wouldn't have an HDMI slot. Other than that, I would have kept it, but quite frankly, I don't see the difference in it & the cheaper Android we paid $89 for. I've been messing with it since Christmas & I've had it. Not even Samsung has the HDMI adapter to make it work. Bummer!

Reviews.Title: Tab 2 and Tab 3 almost identical. Best Android Alternative to Apple
Reviews.Author: Nicolai T. Szlufik
Reviews.Content: I love the freedom of Android but love how Apple makes their Ipads. If I had to chose a tablet that tried to come close, it would have been this tablet. Samsung seems to be the one and only company really fighting Apple on tablets but unfortunately it looks like they are giving up. I purchased the Tab 2 10.1 last year and it worked for me. I like the interface and the customizability, etc. The tab 3 is the newer version with minor changes - the charging cable, a physical home button and I dont know what else. But they really didnt invest much as far as improving performance by any large margin. I had thought about exchanging this one for the newer one, but there really is no point. this Tablet does its job just fine. If you wana go Android becuase you like Android, Samsung makes a good enough option to be satisfied with.

Reviews.Title: Fair quality
Reviews.Author: Mont23
Reviews.Content: It is a good tablet. However, not good for Skype calls as Skype keeps on restarting and sometimes it doesn't work unless you restart the whole tablet. It gets slower with time. I won't give it more than 4

Reviews.Title: not excactly what I expected..
Reviews.Author: Elad Ravid
Reviews.Content: The Galaxy Tab2 should be a good choice but somehow it started to make problems after three months so I had to fix it..

Reviews.Title: The best there is from Android.
Reviews.Author: Old Codger
Reviews.Content: It is with both sadness and jubilation that I am writing this review. I purchased 2 Marquis MP977 tablets from Amazon and one from ebay and all 3 were DOA when received. Went through hell on earth getting those straightened out and getting refunds because in every case, the manufacturer said to send it back to the seller for a refund or replacement. But I bought a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1 at auction and it took right off with blazingly great performance as soon as I got it home. Everything was perfect. the only thing that I was disappointed with was that it only had Android 4.0.1 (Ice Cream Sandwich) installed because I know through several friends and reviews that the later version 4.1.1 (Jelly Bean) had much greater capability and stability. BUT, this thing was running so well that I was willing to overlook this as a minor drawback. Much to my surprise, three days after cranking up the Galaxy, I had it connected to my WiFi and registered it with Samsung and Google Android. Immediately after registration, the unit went into an automatic upgrade mode which I believed was just to assure that all the utilities were up-to-date. It seemed a little slow but I didn't mind all that much and finally it gave up all its extra activity and said that it was through and turned the system back over to me. Being a little concerned, I went to check out the system state and what I found astounded me. Although the update did all that I thought it would do, I was almost bowled over to discover that the operating system was now up to 4.1.1. After a thorough check on installed packages, there were more useful system packages than I had ever hoped for. I had a like new, state-of-the-art tablet that was performing at breakneck capability and speed. All this and I never even asked for anything. What a difference in company support!!!Angers me now over the fact that I went cheap to start with in getting the Marquis tabs and I think that I have learned a lesson. The BIG plus is; I'm so happy now with the Galaxy that it makes up for all the misery I went through. I HIGHLY recommend the Samsung and If I ever need good personal electronics again, That's where I'll start looking first.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2, Good Tablet at Great Value
Reviews.Author: Roger James "Doc"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is an all around excellent Tablet. I've owned the original 7 in tab which was nice but too expensive and slightly under performing compared to this tablet. I also own the Toshiba 10 inch tablet and the Samsung 7 inch Tab 2 which are OK but really are not in  the same league. This tablet outperforms these other tablets in just about every way. The other tablets had either short battery life, were too slow or not as responsive as the Tab2 10 inch.This tablet is very sharp, easy to read, very responsive and the battery life is spectacular compared to the other tablets I use. Is this good enough to replace a notebook or laptop? I don't think so. I've seen tablets used in very creative and productive ways but it can't replace my desktop or laptop. I find even my old very slow net book will outperform this tablet and any other Tablet (surface excluded). This tablet is just a great electronic toy that is also very useful for web surfing, video, displaying camera images, and a 1000 other uses. I think most purchases of a tablet will use it as a very portable computer which it is but not their sole computer. There are so many application for its use most of which I haven't discovered yet.The best thing about this tablet is it works almost as well as the very best tablet out there but is now very reasonably priced. Why spend $500 or more for a tablet that will be replaced in 2 years. I mention this period because the batteries are not user serviceable and it's life is unknown (probably 2-3 years)The tablets available in the next few years may match laptop power of today, who knows.Overall I like the Tablet a lot. I use it along with my Kindle for reading, Pandora, driving a creative stereo speaker via Bluetooth, checking email, a few games, Amazon, and Netflix, and viewing my cameras digital images which works out great in the field. I could use it more but I like using my big 17 laptop with 17 core, 8 GB memory, Windows 7 and big solid state drive. It boots much faster than the tablet between 5 and 15 seconds. If you are tired of long boot times on your computer try a SSD, you will be pleasantly surprised.If you love Apple products, you may not like this Android device, however if you have any Android phone, I feel confident you will probably really like and be glad you bought this tablet. I bought a Bear motion leather cover (excellent) that acts as a stand and the tablet can be used vertically or horizontally and protect the tablet from damage. Overall The Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10 inch Tablet is a great tablet at a reasonable price and you won't regret the purchase.

Reviews.Title: It was a Mother's Day gift for my wife
Reviews.Author: Ray Mooney
Reviews.Content: After 54 years of marriage my wife said "I love my Galaxy 2 10.1 - it's perfect - and I've decided to keep you."  I got it on sale for under $300, scored major points with her and we're both very happy.  Everyone we've talked with who has had experience with this tab says it was an excellent choice. I did lots of research prior to purchasing, not only Amazon reviews, but it's recommended by Consumer Reports as well.  I thought I'd chosen wisely.  She told me yesterday, "I'm learning new stuff everyday I can do on my Galaxy, it's even more perfect than I initially thought."  If you make this choice, I sincerely feel you'll be happy with it.

Reviews.Content: Before I purchased this tablet I researched which 1 I wanted.  This was the most reasonable for me in my price range.  I LOVE my tablet! It's fast & the WiFi on it is great, absolutely no complaints!

Reviews.Author: Susan Brinkman "Susan from Southaven"
Reviews.Content: After using an IRULU tablet for a whole 2 months, I had to replace it.  Too many reasons for dissatisfaction to go into...suffice it to say that it's not worth ANY money.  Having a Samsung Galaxy Android phone and reading the reviews, decided to order it.  It's great and haven't had any problems at all.  I didn't realize how lousy the IRULU was until using the Samsung.  It costs more but WELL worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: this is a wonderful tablet
Reviews.Author: R. Heller "Book Lover"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Galaxy Tab2 after researching current tablets on a number of web sites . I had to replace my Toshiba Thrive which was my first tablet . It developed a crack in the upper left corner . I say developed, because it was never dropped and was always kept in a protective case. Since it was warranteed with Squaretrade, they told me to send the Toshiba to them and they will be sending me $300.00 ( my cost for the tablet) to replace it. The Galaxy Tab came in at about that price. The crack was the best thing that happened to me ! I didn't realize how wonderful a tablet could be ! The Galaxy is a brilliant instrument . It towers over the Thrive in design, display and ease of use. It is sleek, responsive and a joy to use. I wanted a Samsung product since I am now using the Galaxy Blaze smart phone and enjoy that device very much. I considered upgrading to the Galaxy Note, but after comparing both devices I choose the Tab 2 for it's price as I am not a gamer and don't require the fastest processors.I've had it only a few days and so far, I am enjoying it very much !BTW, Squaretrade warranty is the only way to go. they have come through now 3 times for me ....I would never own another electronic device without their warranty. Let's face it...these things break sooner or later !!!!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet on the market!
Reviews.Author: Charles W. Salmon "fishbaitcws"
Reviews.Content: It will take 5 hours to charge it but it is worth it. GREAT sound with stereo speakers! Buy the extra 32GB class 10 memory card to put in it. Amazon has one for about $23. I got this baby for only $299 and the memory chip gave me a super tablet for only $322. Now I want to speak to those of you who are not familiar with tablets (ipads). This can only be used with your "at home wifi" or at Starbucks or McDonald's; any where you can pick up a WiFi signal. It is NOT a tablet like you buy from ATT&T; or Sprint. They also get a signal from the telephone towers just like your phone and you must purchase a datta plan. They also can be set up for "at home wifi" too and McDonald's, Etc------Now for all of you Samsung telephone owners; My wife & I both have Samsung Galaxy Note phones (first release) and the operating system is almost identical! As a matter of fact if you join the ":cloud" (it's free) your phone and tablet will be linked together. I have said enough!

Reviews.Title: I like very much with a caveat
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Rentschler
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I waited for nearly a year before I purchased it. I checked Amazon reviews, CNET, PC World, comments in forums, and finally decided on this tablet. I've had it about three weeks. Learning has been an adventure, but I am a "user" even if I don't understand the difference between Jelly Beans, Ice Cream Sandwiches and Gingerbread (other than how they look and taste! haha). Seriously, those things don't mean anything to me so they don't matter. I had a list of things that did:play movies, play games, be able to write & save it, needed a USB port for flash drives and ebook capability if I wanted it (do not have one nor have I wanted one - I prefer real books).So I got this Samsung. Graphics are beautiful but I do use powersave mode so I keep it a bit dimmed most of the time. Still, the visuals are fab. The audio? No complaints. I've downloaded the Amazon cloud app and listen to my cloud music while I write. I downloaded Dropbox app from Google Play Store and am using it for writing and storage. Tablet came with Polaris Office but it kept shutting down on its own so I ditched it in favor of DropBox. (I understand that Kingston Office is avail free too, just in case others were wondering. I wanted to do MS Office docs so this was one reason I did not go to the Apple side).I purchased an adapter plug for the available port so I can plug in my flash drives to download and use files. I haven't done it yet but I now have the ability to do so. I also got a longer plug with wall adapter for charging. Beware cheaper plug options, they often do not fit tightly in the tablet. Get xtras directly from Samsung as I did. No problems with anything. (Some advertisements say the products are for Galaxy Tab 10.1. Be SURE it specifically says Tab 2 10.1 - P5113).What I'm mad about is the lack of a Flash Player!  One of the reasons I got this tablet instead of Apple was its ability to play Flash. Well I was wrong. You can't. It is no longer supported (there is a work-around to download an older version of Flash which I intend to do). Samsung should have said this up front and I feel cheated that they didn't. I can't watch some YouTube vids or any Amazon movies because there's no flash!!  And I wanted the movies as one of my main reasons for having this while traveling.I've played a few games. And I have downloaded Chrome instead of the installed "browser." Everything seems to work fine, no lagging or dragging.I also got a Kensington Pro bluetooth keyboard/case. Fabulous accessory. So I'm totally portable, much more so than with my 17" laptop.I do really like this tablet. I'm disappointed in having to do a Flash workaround because I feel this info was deliberately kept from us (But that's on Samsung, not Amazon). I will say that I got the HBO.Go app and I did watch Game of Thrones from HBO. It played perfectly.For anyone who isn't geek oriented but wanted a tablet with ease of use and portablity, I think you will like the options and quality of this Samsung. I got mine for $349.xx and think it is an excellent price compared to other tablets out there.

Reviews.Title: At first - I loved it, after the firmware update, useless piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: Initially I loved my Galaxy tab2. It was fast while browsing online, awesome screen resolution and a nice design. It fit my needs of browsing the net and occasionally streaming movies just fine. However, after the firmware update, the tab2 became painfully slow at everything - from opening email to shuffling between "desktop" pages. It even had trouble pulling up simple things like a calculator. It just wouldn't operate. The worst of it is that there was an update, but my tab2 wasn't able to actually download and install the update. After going online and figuring out the workaround, I was able to download and install the update. It helped the slowness by about 10%. Which still renders this tablet as an unusable piece of junk. Do not buy this tablet, even though it looks nice at first, the minute you download any updates, it will completely kill your tablet.

Reviews.Title: One Year Warranty a Problem
Reviews.Author: Christopher Rose
Reviews.Content: My Tab 2 started turning off every two minutes after 14 months of use and the warranty didn't apply. Samsung refers you to a repair place that charges $150 minimum to look at it. A repair could be more. Samsung needs a greatly improved warranty policy but I don't think you'll see it any time soon.

Reviews.Title: Warranty review only
Reviews.Author: MG "Marcos"
Reviews.Content: My tablet is still under warranty and was sent to RSI (Samsung authorized repair center) for the LCD replacement on April 14 2014.The unit was shipped in its original box with extra protection. I received the unit back yesterday 04/24 full of scratches which didn't have before since the tablet was always kept protect by the Samsung cover.I contacted the customer relations which asked me for pictures which I emailed. The customer relation contacted the dealer (RSI) manager who stated that the tablet was checked in with the scratches.Customer relation took the repair center's word for it and said that Samsung could send me a $25 gift certificate which I take as an insult because the repair center is basically stating that I'm making a false statement.I would like to hear from Samsung what can be done to solve this problem. As for now I'm running out of options to get help (Customer Relations and Repair Center - RSI)Thanks in advanceMarcosAbove is a copy of the letter mailed to Samsung Co.PS: this is just an advice more than a review for those who needs to have their Tablets sent to Samsung for repair. Samsung uses Contractors.Please, Take pictures of your unit PRIOR SHIPPING (Front, Back).The Manufacturer warranty is one of the most important feature of the product, that's why I'm giving one star.

Reviews.Title: 30 day warranty, stops working at day 36
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: The tablet I bought was refurbished and had a 30 day warranty. Stopped working touchscreen on day 36. The tablet is now unusable. I asked the seller to be so kind to accept the failure, but they refused saying the 30 day warranty. Okay, the warranty was 30 days, but c'mon !! it only lasted 36 days!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet, not the best. But good.
Reviews.Author: Skipjacks
Reviews.Content: I wanted a usable 10 inch tablet. This perfectly suited the bill.The screen doesn't have the resolution of the newer tablets so there is some image quality issue. But it's not bad. It's certainly not worth an extra $200-$300 for a tablet with a better resolution.And I've used this to watch movies while on planes and such, and it gives a nice vibrant image for video. It's really graphics where you notice that there are better quality screens out there.It's micro SD memory card slot to let you expand the storage was a must have for me. Many tablets have 16GB of internal memory (with half used by the operating system) and tha'ts it. This one let me put in a 32GB external SD card, giving me a tablet with massive storage for an extra $15 (cost of the SD card)The battery life is VERY strong. I charge this about once a week. Sometimes two if I don't use it much. And that's without turning it off between uses. It gives me 8 to 10 hours of screen on time between carges.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2
Reviews.Author: Sacred Courage
Reviews.Content: I can do so much with the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2. I truly do not download much, but for browsing the web and for recreational purposes, the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 ranks high by my standards!

Reviews.Title: what camera?
Reviews.Author: Michael Ramirez
Reviews.Content: it's a good tablet except for the camera.  both the front and rear camera are a total blur and lousy.  I was completely disappointed by the camera.

Reviews.Title: Solid Introductory Tablet
Reviews.Author: Stefan Blitz "editor-in-chief; Forces of Geek"
Reviews.Content: I've debated the need for a tablet since it can't do what I need it to do in terms of upkeeping the site (not entirely true, it can, it just would take a ridiculous amount of time).  Now that I've used the Galaxy 3 for a few months, it's served an incredibly useful purpose, as a companion to my work, and as an essential part of my leisure time.I'm pretty familiar with the Mac OS and have had an Android phone in the past, so using this tablet out of the box took mere moments.  Keep in mind, this is an indispensable tool and I'd be ridiculous not to acknowledge that I'm pretty set in my ways for what I use for what purpose.I primarily use my phone to upkeep on my social media, although Facebook is pretty much up for grabs.  Using it on the Galaxy Tab is a pretty solid experience.Streaming video has been a wonderful experience on the Galaxy Tab.  Although the sound is fairly low without an external speaker or headphones, the picture is crisp.  I primarily use it for Netflix and HBO Go, and would use it for Amazon Streaming if and when an app is released.Reading has been primarily accomplished in the past by my Nook.  Since the Galaxy Tab also has a Kindle app, there really isn't anything that I can't read on this thing.  And everything opens as it should; making the experience simple.I've always been mixed on reading comics on a screen.  I'm not a fan of the Comixology navigated view, but reading books via their regular app, PDF and cbr/cbz files has been pretty fantastic.  Navigation is smooth, and it's easy enough to sit down and read for a bit.I've also used it for shopping (Amazon primarily) and unlike the fruit named tablet, a big caveat is the ability to add memory via a SIM card.  The touch screen is a bit too sensitive, and personally, I found the battery life to be far shorter than I'd expect when just reading.  The placement of the two buttons also tends to cause a number of accidental presses.  The lack of ability to sync to my iTunes account is another disappointment.For me, the Galaxy Tab works, and does so as a secondary/tertiary device.  It delivers, but nothing is particularly amazing; it's just good enough.  The large number of apps available is attractive, but ultimately I found it to be an excellent supplement to my digital arsenal rather than a primary device.

Reviews.Content: good product is what I needed met my expectations. thanks for apoyo.espero in future keep buying good as the one I bid produtos

I had a bunch of other bad quality tablets before, but you can really tell this is a Samsung device - screen is awesome, it moves smoothly, the touch screen also works great, I love it! Strongly recommend.

Reviews.Content: I'm blown away by this tablet. Now I have also purchased a Samsung Galaxy smartphone as well. I like the fact I can expand the memory unlike my previous iPhone where you're stuck with what they give you!!!

Reviews.Title: Cool

Reviews.Content: Wife love's it and that all that counts for me. Easy to carry and light weight. cool and cool cool

Reviews.Author: Bruce Vaughn
Reviews.Content: This table Tab 2 10.1 is working fine with me. I didn't like the company logo that always pop-up when you turn it on.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy Samsung
Reviews.Author: nancy woodsum
Reviews.Content: Never did charge correctly and would not Wi-Fi  every where. Very fussy from the start and by the time it was eight months old the battery would not charge at all. They work fine on my computer with windows  its simply maddening.  Buy a windows tablet! You will be much, much happier  This is not a great tablet.  Bad purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: Good quality and fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Brandon Benjamin
Reviews.Content: The galaxy tab 2 was just what i needed, no longer will a laptop be needed, Good quality from samsung

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Geo
Reviews.Content: Performs well, very fast response to touch and to open apps. Picture quality is great for stills or movies. Easy hack to get flash, just google: flash on samsung galaxy 2. I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Loved it while it worked, but save your money
Reviews.Author: Pat H
Reviews.Content: First of all, I loved this tablet. Were there things I would like to change? Yes. The volume is very low, it takes at least 4 hours to charge, and not being able to use Flash player was a disappointment. But it was fantastic for reading, watching movies (with ear buds in -- again, too quiet), playing games and surfing the web on the go. I got it to study during my breaks at work and when I took a job overseas, of course it came with me. It went everywhere with me.Then the display started blinking to funny colors--all neon green, yellow, orange and pink. Just occasionally at first, then it just stuck there. So movies became a thing of the past. But the screen only glowed an ugly mustard yellow while using Kindle, so it was fine (if a bit unpleasant on the eyes) for reading. I contacted Costco to obtain my purchase information from them since the warranty has two months to go, but the receipt is packed into a storage unit in California and I'm in the Middle East.Then this morning it died. Oh, it responds to the power button. It glows a very dark grey. It makes the appropriate noises for rebooting too. But charging it, rebooting it, and resetting it to the factory default has no effect. The screen turns dark grey and remains blank as a slate. It's hard to troubleshoot a product when you can't see anything on the screen. I went ahead and called Samsung internationally because I'd received the purchase information via email. I would rather not go into my customer service experience there, but I will say I do not intend to buy Samsung again. I paid nearly $400 for this device, it broke after 10 months, and they have no intention of standing by their product.

Reviews.Title: watch amazon movies works by using desktop view.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I found that if you go to the movie you want to watch, then go to your browser settings, check the box for desktop view. Then the warning about your devise is replaced by the watch nowbutton and you can now watch the movie. You must have desktop view enabled.love myctablet..

Reviews.Title: Good but..
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I love the tablet, came in great shape no issues with functionality. The only gripe I have now that I did not understand when purchasing is; since it is refurbished it is not serviced by the normal samsung software or tech support. You have to get hold of a 3rd party company to install updates, which I still haven't been able to do. Aside from that great product.

Reviews.Title: this tablet does everything
Reviews.Author: ANNA LOU
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my tablet. It is so fast and battery lasts longer than any device I've ever had. All my apps work, which was not my experience with cheaper tablets. There was a glitch with doing the first update, but Samsung helped me via Facebook.

Reviews.Title: Very Good product
Reviews.Author: Carina francois
Reviews.Content: I am currently doing my bachelors degree and this helps alot with my studies. I have portablity and conveniece all in one neat package. Shipping was resonably priced and quick. Very useful gadget.

Reviews.Title: Great Value - Refurbished
Reviews.Author: Frederick E. Repich
Reviews.Content: Samsung Galaxy products are superb.  I purchased this as a refurbished, Samsung Galaxy 10.1 Tablet 2 for $184 and am tickled pink with its quality and capabilities.  I've found that OEM refurbished products are often better than a brand new product since the infant mortality factor has already been eliminated  and it has been re-subjected to the same quality standards.  Oh, and I might add that I always seek the top-line model or product from a reputable OEM.

Reviews.Title: Just what they described
Reviews.Author: Georgie Weatherbee
Reviews.Content: Was just what the described. Just taking us a while to figure it out. Still don't hardly use it as the rechargeable cord was broken. I did call about it but never received another one to replace. My daughter has one just like it, so she let me use hers, but it takes so long I didn't want to keep her from using hers.

Reviews.Title: The best tablet out there
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: I have had this Tablet for over a year now and hands down it is the best one I've ever owed.  It is large enough so you can see everything and it has a very long battery life, which is great if you're using daily or once a day.  The screens are simple and navigation is pretty cut and dry.  I'm not a big techy person so this was simple to learn and very easy to get on the internet and check emails, favorite websites and even watch my Netflix shows while doing laundry!  A great buy and a great tablet!

Reviews.Title: Very slow and unresponsive compared to the iPad
Reviews.Author: Christy Trudeau
Reviews.Content: I bought this because it was about $100 cheaper than the iPad. It has some good features such as the speakers, ability to add memory etc. My main problem with it is that it is getting slower by the day. I have had it 3 months now and using it is becoming more painful than fun. It is like using my first iPod to surf the internet. It takes 5 seconds to respond  when you click on something. It takes several seconds when you are typing for the screen to catch up with the letters on the keypad. I thought I would tough it out and see if the benefits outweigh the cons. Stupid decision! Now I am beyond my return period with Amazon.I am writing this review on my wife's iPad which is 3 generations old (2yrs). It is as fast and responsive as the day we bought it. Wish I went for another iPad in the first place.

Reviews.Title: This Android Is As Good As Any Apple Pad
Reviews.Author: Ikechukwu Etoh
Reviews.Content: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 (10.1-Inch, Wi-Fi) is well worthy to play in the league of the apple iPad or any other pads out there for that matter.

Reviews.Title: good

Reviews.Title: Love it ... with mixed emotions :-)

Reviews.Title: thanks

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "movie lover"
Reviews.Content: I have had it just over 90 days and it now does not complete many commands. For instance, I cannot adjust the sound. I can no longer register where you are in an audio story. Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Sophia Ha
Reviews.Content: I bought this refurbished and as a Christmas gift and it looked and works just like new. There were very minimal scratches almost barely noticeable but that was expected. The delivery service was great and arrived before the final delivery date. Still no problems with it after two months. Great buy and great seller with true promised conditions made on the product.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy Tab 2
Reviews.Author: Ed Trader
Reviews.Content: I have a Galaxy Verizon phone and usage of the phone and tablet parallel. No need to learn two different formats. The Galaxy tablet is responsive and learning new apps is easy.

Reviews.Title: decent value for your money
Reviews.Author: Ariel J. Preminger
Reviews.Content: This tablet performs adequately but after using it for a few months it seems clear to me that it is under powered. Probably the processor is obsolete and this will cause it to load pages a tad slower than you would want, and also crash quite frequently. On the other hand it has a very crisp screen and you pay a fraction of what the latest iPad costs. Not a bad deal.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kim Underwood
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on tablets before I bought this one. I have a Samsung Galaxy III phone and love it, so I decided to go with this tablet. It works very similar and that made it very easy to use for me. One of the main reasons I bought this was because you could use an SD card which adds memory. When I got it, I was VERY disappointed that you could not transfer anything on to the SD card without removing the card from the tablet, inserting it in to your computer/laptop and downloading things on to it, then put it back in the tablet. Within a couple of months that I got it, there was an upgrade! So....now you can transfer and/or save apps, movies, etc. from the tablet directly on to the SD card! I don't have any complaints about it at all since the upgrade. I use it on a regular basis and my grandbabies use it a lot. I purchased a very nice anti-glare screen protector, which I would highly recommend, to protect it from scratches and the occasional sticky little fingers that play on it. Another thing, the resolution is lower on this vs. the higher priced tablets, but unless you're a photography major, it is very good, acceptable quality. I wouldn't pay $300 or more for the higher resolution. Overall, I would highly recommend buying this.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!
Reviews.Author: Roselyn
Reviews.Content: My husband uses the tablet to read, watch documentaries, movies and uses it for writing documents. I too have a Samsung Galaxy tab 2 which I use daily. They are winners!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Beverly Gail Wilson
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet as a gift for my husband. He loves it and uses it every day. I already had a 7" Galaxy Tab 2 of my own which I love. Item is a referb but you would never know. It's a really great item!

Reviews.Title: Seems To Require Charging A Lot
Reviews.Author: Harry Young
Reviews.Content: I like this tablet. It seems to receive wi-fi signal well, unlike a previous tablet I had that doesn't work if you're in another room from the computer modem. Only thing I don't like is that I have to recharge frequently. I recharge about every two or three days. It's listed as 8 hour battery charge life, but doesn't seem like it. I set my settings in all ways to save battery, but it seems to deplete fast. Google Play provides many good apps, as this tablet uses google play. It has a lot preinstalled apps, many which I don't use, so I can't comment. The keyboard that pops up on screen is easy to use. This tablet accepts voice commands, but I don't use that feature. I don't have much computer or tech knowledge so I can't give a thorough review. I am satisfied with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Worst customer service ever
Reviews.Author: Gwen Stewart
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my grandson for Christmas but he has been unable to use it because the charger that came with it was not the correct charger.  I emailed the company but was told it was too late to exchange the merchandise although it had not been 60 days.  I thought I filed  a claim asking to replace the charger only before the deadline but never received a response so I logged into my account and saw that yesterday was the deadline.  This has been the most frustrating experience I have ever had.  I will never purchase from this seller and I am rethinking how I view Amazon's customer service also.  I now have a tablet that cannot be used until I purchase another charger myself.  Which has been very difficult to find.

Reviews.Title: Keeping Me In Touch
Reviews.Author: Michael Petretto
Reviews.Content: I am learning more and more every day how my Samsung Galaxy Tablet gives me more independance frombeing confined to home to access any online information about communications and financial planning withour assets. It also gives me the opportunity to communicate online with our financial advisor.  " I Love It "

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet.

I take it everywhere, use it for everything, and it works just as amazing now as it did the first day it came in the mail. I have more apps than I know what to do with and everything works great. The only "problem" with it, is the battery life will be shortened quickly if you're running games for hours. But that's what PC and consoles are for. So this tablet gets my recommendation.

No scratches or dings, so far works perfectly I was lucky. I got the tab and a case for $259.00 total.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 (10.1-Inch, Wi-Fi)
Reviews.Author: Richard R
Reviews.Content: This is NOT a rehash of the technical specs of the tablet.I received my Samsung Galaxy Tablet and a few moments later, I was up and running.I did the brief setup, signed in with my Gmail account and my existing account including calendar, applications were transferred to my new Tablet.  Some applications which I favor on my Samsung Droid phone did not transfer as they are currently not compatible with the Tablet (Example CamScanner and others). Note that "Amazon Prime Instant Video"  content is not currently supported on this Tablet. However, Netflix is supported.I removed the factory default home screen widgets (Game Hub, Movie Hub) as these are not important to me and replaced the home screen with application shortcuts, widgets and desktop background of my choice.The Tablet is a great "convenience" bridge between my laptop and Samsung Droid phone. For some applications, I prefer using the Tablet's  larger screen rather than using the phone.The HD display is stunningly crisp and clear for watching movies or for reading books. Netflix streams flawlessly on the Tablet and the picture quality is ...stunning. The virtual keyboard is very precise and responsive even though I have the Otterbox screen protector over the screen.The built in camera is unimpressive in picture quality but I did not purchase the Tablet to be a camera. I have Nikon Pro DSLRs for that purpose.I did find that file transfer to the external microSD card was painfully slow but solved that issue by removing the card from the Tablet and doing my file transfers to the card while it is in a card reader instead. (32GB Class 10 microSD).Overall, I love the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 considering the price point of the product. It it simply a great product.Update: June 28... I had a chance to listen to music using a decent set of earphones and using "PowerAmp" Application as the media player.1. The sound quality is unbelievably awesome even with the equalization set to "flat" in PowerAmp.2. I had a Logitech "Write-Away Bluetooth Tablet Keyboard Lite for iPad" hanging around and decided to test it on the Galaxy. It paired and works well on the Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 10.1!3. In addition to the native web browser, Google Chrome and Firefox work smoothly and responsively on the Tablet.
